Por lo cual, solicita un financiamiento para comprar gaseosas, granos básicos, jabones, sopas instantáneas, pan, café, aceites y demás productos, que le servirán para ofrecer mayor variedad y calidad en su pulpería. Susana planea con las ganancias ahorrar para mejor la infraestructura de su casa  y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Susana has always been a responsible and entrepreneurial woman.  She's worked from an early age to support economically her home.  With her husband's help she opened a convenience store in her house so that she could work and still tend to her family.
She's requesting a loan to buy sodas, basic grains, soaps, instant soups, bread, coffee, oils, and other products that will help her offer a better variety and quality in her store.  Susana plans to save from her profits so she can improve her house infrastructure and grow her business.

loans.use: to buy sodas, basic grains, soaps, instant soups, bread, coffee, and oils.

loans.name: Musa

texts.en: Musa is 34 years old. He lives in Rustavi district with his wife. Musa is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, he grows aubergine (eggplant) on the family-owned agricultural land. He sells the harvest locally at a good price. His wife is unemployed. Musa wants to start a husbandry business and requested a loan to purchase calves. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables him to get a loan of 3,000 GEL. As the calves are purchased, he will feed them, raise them, and start producing dairy products in future. The Start Up program will be a great support for his family.

loans.use: to purchase calves to start a husbandry business

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en: Sharon is applying for a second loan to support her studies through her graduation in December 2016 at the Maharishi Institute. She has provided the following update on her progress since receiving the first loan: “The loan has helped me through my studies, because if it was not for the loan, I wouldn’t have managed to complete my third year. I also got extra cash to help me with transport and other materials needed for my academic year. I am really grateful for the help I got and I will continue to be grateful."

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Eunice. She is 38 years old, married, and blessed with four children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa (HiH EA) in 2013.

Eunice has a tailoring business and operates a kiosk. She has gone through Hand in Hand Eastern Africa training (HiH EA), which has enabled her to acquire skills on enterprise and value chain management. She is borrowing a Kiva loan to purchase more textile fabric (vitenge) for her tailoring business. This will increase her income, which she will use to comfortably educate her children, as well as to provide medical care and other family needs.

She is grateful to Kiva and their lenders for their support and promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: To buy textiles for her tailoring business, which will increase her sales

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en: Shazia is a 45-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is her husband. She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate extra income. For the improvement of her business, Shazia has requested a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to expand her business and income level.

loans.name: Davlatmo

texts.ru:
Давлатмо добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она счастливая мама и бабушка. У нее не очень большая семья. Давлатмо имеет одного сына и двое дочери. Сын женат и имеет детей. Дочери и невестка домохозяйка. 
Жители районов и сел Таджикистана, в том числе района Шахритуса в основном занимаются животноводством и земледелием. Уже 2 года Давлатмо занимается животноводством. Ей нравится  работать на скотном дворе, и у нее есть немного опыта, которого получила от соседа. Деятельность животноводства для Давлатмо является основным, прибыльным и удобным. 
   Давлатмо решила расширить свою деятельность и приобрести больше скотов, но достаточной суммы у него не оказалось, по этой причине она просит кредит. На сумму кредита Давлатмо купит пару голов скота, и увеличить свою деятельность. Давлатмо верит и надеется на Вашу помощь. Ведь мир не без добрых людей!
texts.en: Davlatmo is a kind and hardworking woman and a happy mother and grandmother. She does not have a large family: one son and two daughters. Her son is married and has children. Her daughters and her daughter-in-law are all homemakers. The residents of Tajikistan’s provinces, including the region of Shahrituz, mostly make their living from livestock breeding and land cultivation. Davlatmo has been breeding livestock for two years. She likes working on a farm. She has some experience, which she has gained thanks to her neighbor. Livestock breeding is the main, most convenient and profitable activity for Davlatmo. She now decided to expand her business by buying more livestock. Since her own money is not enough, she is requesting a loan, which would allow her to increase her herd and expand her business. Davlatmo hopes that you will help her. The world is not without good people after all!

loans.use: to increase her livestock count and expand her business

loans.name: Marlin Massiel

texts.es:
El sueño de Marlin es graduarse con honores de su carrera universitaria, contaduría pública y finanzas. Actualmente cursa su último año, gracias al apoyo de su familia,  por ello que día a día se esfuerza por obtener las mejores calificaciones, para así aprovechar la oportunidad que se le esta brindando.  

Sin embargo, para desarrollarse mejor en su profesión solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora, así  podrá aprovechar esta herramienta tecnológica para agilizar sus trabajos académicos. Entre los planes de Marlin está estudiar un posgrado.
texts.en:
Marlin's dream is to finish with honors her college degree in public accounting and finance.  She's in her last year of her degree thanks to the support of her family.  That is why she works hard day after day to obtain the best grades and thus make the best of the opoportunity she's being give.  
However, in order to better develop in her profession she's requesting a loan to buy a computer and be able to take advantage of this technological tool to expedite her academic projects.  Marlin also plans to pursue a graduate degree.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза родилась в рабочей семье. Ей 28 лет. В школе училась хорошо. После окончание школы она поступила в педагогический колледж. И училась там три года. Получила неполное высшее образование. Шахноза вышла замуж. Родила двоих детей. Она заботливая мать и жена. Муж Шахнозы работает плотником. Он один содержит семью. Но его зарплата не может полностью обеспечить все семейные расходы. Шахноза с целью помоч мужу хотела устроиться на работу. Но к сожалению хорошо оплачиваемой работы не нашла. Так как у него неполное образование. Она решила продолжить учебу в ВУЗе . И  сейчас она учиться в последнем курсе. Так как Шахноза хочет еще глубже расширить свой кругозор через интернет узнать много нового. Для этого ей необходим ноутбук. Поэтому ей пришлось обратиться в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Она приносить свою благодарность МДО Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Shahnoza was born into a working family. She is 28 years old. She studied well in school. After finishing school she enrolled in a teacher training college. She studied there for three years but she did not complete her higher education. Shahnoza got married and gave birth to two children. She is a caring mother and wife. Shahnoza's husband works as a carpenter. He supports the family on his own, but his salary cannot completely provide for all of the family's expenses. Shahnoza would like to get a job in order to help her husband, but unfortunately she has not found a well-paying job because she has an incomplete education. She has decided to continue her university studies and now she is studying in her final year. Since Shahnoza wants to expand her horizons further she can learn a lot through the Internet. She needs a notebook computer to do this, so she has had to apply to MDO Arvand for a loan. She expresses her gratitude to MDO Arvand for its support.

loans.use: to buy a notebook computer to help her study.

loans.name: Gidion

texts.en: Gidion is 52 years old, father of ten children and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He deals in buying and selling cocoa, and gets additional income from cocoa growing. He also grows and sells food stuffs like maize, cassava, beans and other items to get more income for the family. He works hard and has plans of educating his children, buying land and expand cocoa growing. His main challenges are price changes, expensive labor, theft, and inadequate capital for expanding the business.  Gidion has requested a loan to rent cocoa gardens for harvest and sell to to cocoa companies.

loans.use: to rent cocoa gardens for harvest and sell cocoa beans

loans.name: Misbah

texts.en:
Misbah is a 30-year-old married woman. Some time ago, her brother-in-law (shown in the photo) started a van transport business. He owns one van and needs some financial help. 

Therefore, Misbah has requested a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR for her brother-in-law. He will use the amount to buy a new engine for the van to provide better services to his customers. He is hopeful that his business will expand with the help of this loan amount.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for the van to provide better services to the customers

loans.name: Ramil

texts.en:
Ramil is 38 years old, married and has a son. Ramil is a hard-working man. He's been a farmer his whole life, with crops and cattle. He inherited this profession from his parents, so he gained much experience just by being born into it. He has a small portion of land where he grows onion, carrots, and other vegetables. He sows and harvests twice a year and usually gets a good harvest. 
Now he  is going to grow other kinds of vegetables and offer them to local people, but his situation is very hard. He needs to raise fruits and care for them, but the lack of water in the region makes it a problem for him. Because of this problem, the productivity has fallen and he can’t cover the family’s needs. He applied for a loan of 1200 azn in order to be able to supply water to his garden weekly. This will increase the productivity again, and the family’s income will rise. This is going to be his thirds loan, please support him.

loans.use: to supply water to his garden weekly

loans.name: Ulker

texts.en:
Ulker  is 32 years old, married, and has 3 kids. Ulker's husband is a butcher, but earnings from this job aren’t enough and the main source of income for family is farming. She grows and sells seasonal vegetables such as pumpkin, cucumber, potatoes, and so on. She has been growing and selling them at the local bazaar for 6 years. She has good experience in this area. Her monthly income is 150 AZN. 

Vegetables are in high demand in Azerbaijan because people like to use them for fresh salads and delicious national dishes. They attend local groceries and buy fresh and tasty vegetables there. They know that vegetables raised in private gardens are always fresh and without pesticides.
Ulker needs money to cover her family’s demands. She applied for a loan of 500 AZN in order to supply quality fertilizers and increase harvest and income.

loans.use: to supply quality fertilizers and increase harvest and income.

loans.name: Santa Lucia Group

texts.es:
En total son 17 mujeres inspiradas que se esfuerzan día a día para solventar los gastos del hogar y por sobre todo aumentar sus ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia y darles todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener. Forman parte del comité con el fundamento de ayudarse.
La Sra. Acela se siente agradecida e inspirada en esforzarse cada día, ella se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías y comenta que por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Esta poniendo todo de si para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de hilos, bastidores, hilos de color y otros insumos para poder hacer todo tipo de artesanías. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: In total there are 17 inspired women who work hard day by day to pay for household expenses, and specially to increase their income to help their families and give them everything they could not have. They form part of the committee with the purpose of helping each other. Acela is grateful and inspired to work hard every day. She works making handcrafts, and she comments that through this work, she supports her family and her loved ones. She is putting all of herself to prosper in life. She is requesting this loan to buy threads, frames, color threads and other inputs so she can make all types of handcrafts. She is grateful for the given opportunity to continue with her work as she has been doing so far.

loans.use: to buy threads, frames, color threads and other inputs.

loans.name: Donabegim

texts.ru: Это прекрасная женщина Донабегим. Ей 51 лет. Она развелась с мужем. У нее один сын и одна дочка. Дочка замужем и живет отдельно. Сын находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, потому что он в родине без работы. Загранице он зарабатывает на жизнь. Донабегим сейчас занимается изготовлением коктейль и мороженое. У нее имеется маленький аппарат, с помощью его она изготавливает коктейль.  Вот так она зарабатывает на жизнь. Донабегим  решила купить молоко и современный  аппарат для изготовления мороженное и коктейль. Но у нее нет такое количества сумма денег для купли необходимые средств, и по этой причине она обратилась к Вам за кредитом. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку. В будущем у нее мечта открыть цех по изготовления мороженное и коктейль.
texts.en: This is Donabegim, a wonderful 51-year-old woman. She is divorced and has a son and a daughter. Her daughter is married and lives with her family. Her son currently works in Russia because there are no jobs at home. Donabegim earns her living by making milkshakes and ice cream. She has a small milkshake maker. This is how she makes her living. Donabegim decided to buy milk and a modern ice cream and milkshake machine. Since her own money is not enough, she is applying for a loan. She believes in your help. She hopes that in the future she will be able to open an ice cream and milkshake parlour.

loans.use: to buy milk and an ice cream and milkshake machine

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
La justicia siempre ha caracterizado a María, por ello decido estudiar Derecho para defender a  los menos afortunados. Además de ser una profesión que la impulsa como profesional en diversas áreas, la hace crecer como  persona.  

Ella tiene 3 años de haber egresado y en la actualidad está trabajando. Por ello, para continuar abriéndose oportunidades en su área laboral, solicita un crédito para el pago de un curso de inglés. Además de  estudiar una maestría luego de terminar dicho curso.
texts.en:
Maria has always been characterized for being a very fair and just person so she decided to study Law so she could defend those who are less fortunate.  In addition to being a profession that motivates her in various areas it also makes her grow at a personal level.  She graduated 3 years ago and is currently working.  
She's requesting a loan to pay for an English course so she can keep opening doors and getting new opportunities in her field.  She also plans to obtain a masters degree once she completes the course.

loans.use: to pay for an English course.

loans.name: Santa Librada Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Santa Librada está en su ciclo número 8 del programa de Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, donde todas trabajas y se ayudan las unas a las otras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Graciela, Directora del Comité, quien es dueña de un local de venta de ropas en un lugar muy estratégico de la ciudad. Es una persona muy trabajadora que se está abriendo camino para poder dar a sus seres queridos todo lo que necesitan para una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de prendas variadas, como ser remeras, jeans, camisas, pantalones y otros para la venta, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas, luchando por poder mejorar cada día. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
The group named Santa Librada is in its eighth program cycle with the Mujeres Emprendedoras Committee, where they all work, they help themselves by succeeding, and each one helps the others.

One of the members is Graciela, the director of the Committee, who is the owner of a clothing store in a very strategic place in the city. She is a very hard-working person who is opening a path to be able to provide to her loved ones all that they need for a dignified life that lacks nothing.

She is requesting this loan to purchase a variety of clothing items, such as t-shirts, jeans, shirts, pants, and others to sell, and with it she will be able to continue with her sales, struggling to be able to improve every day. She is thankful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to be someone in life.

loans.use: to purchase t-shirts, jeans, shirts, pants, and other clothing items to sell.

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru: Это счастливая женщина на фотке Хосият. Ей 53 года. Она развелась с мужем и у нее одна единственная  дочь. Дочке 25 года. Хосият из района Н.Хусрав. Она всегда старается идти вперед, и не боится трудности. Хосият на рынке продает миндаль, фисташки и орехи. Путем продажи она зарабатывает на жизнь. Ей на работе помогает ее дочь. Ее доходы только от этой деятельностью. Хосият решила закупить миндаль, фисташки и орехи, чтобы увеличить товарооборот. Она с большими надеждами обратилась к Вам за кредитом. Ей очень нужно Ваша поддержка.
texts.en: The happy woman in the photo is Khosiyat. She is 53 years old. She is divorced and she has one daughter. Her daughter is 25 years old. Khosiyat is from the Nosiri Khusrav area. She always strives to move forwards, and is not afraid of difficulties. Khosiyat sells almonds, pistachios, and nuts at the market. She makes her living by selling. Her daughter helps her in her work. Her income is just from this business. Khosiyat has decided to buy almonds, pistachios and nuts in order to increase her stock. She has turned to you with high hopes for a loan. She really needs your support.

loans.use: to buy almonds, pistachios, and nuts to increase her stock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy skirts, ponchos, sheets, etc.

loans.name: Berta Lilian

texts.es:
Berta, tiene una granja de gallinas ponedoras, además practica la crianza de cerdos y cultivo de granos básicos, actualmente vive en casa propia desde hace 20 años en compañía de su hijo, el cual está estudiando, hace varios años que inicio su negocio y poco a poco ha adquirido experiencia para irlo ampliando.
Necesita comprar concentrado para alimentar a los cerdos y a las aves de corral para fortalecer la granja, de esta manera surtirá las demandas de sus clientes y mantendrá con vida su fuente de ingresos.
Sus aspiraciones son tener estabilidad económica para que ella y su hijo tenga un mejor estilo de vida, también cancelara sus deudas.
texts.en:
Berta has a farm of egg laying hens and also breeds pigs and grows basic grains. For the last 20 years she's lived in her own home with her son who attends to school.  She started her business a few years ago and has been gaining experience little by little which has allowed her to grow.  
She needs to buy feed for the pigs and the poultry to be able to strengthen her farm.  This will help her to meet her clients demands and will maintain her source of income.  
Her goals are to have economic stability so that she and her son can have a better quality of life and also be able to pay off her debts.

loans.use: to buy feed for the pigs and the poultry to be able to strengthen her farm.

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es:
Luis Alfonso es un micro-empresario joven a sus 22 años de edad carga con grandes responsabilidades, tiene una hija de 2 años  y es la fuente de ingresos principal en la casa de su padre, su vida ha sido tediosa salió de estudiar por buscar una medio de sustento para llevar el alimento a la mesa  a su pareja e hija. 

Luis se encontraba perdido pero gracias a un amigo encontró una luz, este amigo le recomendó crear empresa, volverse independiente y le sugirió la venta de sandalias que es el calzado más usado en Sincelejo debido a su comodidad y economía. 

Desde entonces Luis se dedica a la venta de sandalias, las ofrece en almacenes en cantidades, puerta a puerta, amigos, familiares a todo el mundo es una persona muy enérgica que se le ve esa ambición de salir adelante y luchar por un mejor futuro para su hija.

Luis quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de sandalias,gracias a este préstamo Luis tendrá existencias para brindar ofertas y aplicar estrategias de mercadeo para atraer clientes y lograr aumentar sus ventas que es la meta principal por la cual solicita el apoyo.
texts.en:
Luis Alfonso is a young small businessman. At his 22 years of age he carries great responsibilities: he has a 2 year old daughter; and he is the main source of income in his father's house. His life has been difficult. He had to stop studying in order to look for income to support his partner and daughter.
Luis was lost, but thanks to a friend he found a light. This friend recommended him to open a business, to become independent, and suggested him to start
selling sandals, which is the most commonly used footwear in Sincelejo because of its comfort and price. Since then, Luis works selling sandals. He offers them to stores in quantities, and to friends, relatives and everybody door to door. He is a very energetic person who has the drive to move ahead and work hard for a better future for his daughter.
Luis wants to request a loan to buy an assortment of a large quality of sandals. This loan will allow him offer them more in promotions, and to have the necessary items to have a good business.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of a large quantity of sandals in order to have a better inventory.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis, actualmente se encuentra acompañado, vive con su pareja y su hijo de 3 años de edad, él se encarga de cubrir las necesidades familiares, su actividad económica es practicar la crianza de cerdos y el destazo de los mismos, el oficio lo aprendió con la ayuda de su padre y desde hace 3 años tiene su propio negocio, trabaja de lunes a sábado.
Para aumentar los cerdos y luego tener más disponibilidad para realizar el destazo de los mismos, está solicitando un crédito para comprar cerdos de corta edad para criarlos y alimentarlos hasta conseguir que estén robustos para destazarlos o venderlos, de esta manera espera continuar trabajando para cancelar su deuda y cambiar el estilo de vida que comparte con su familia.
Sus aspiraciones son mantener la continuidad de su negocio para que en el futuro pueda tener los recursos económicos con los que piensa apoyar a su hijo para que estudie en la universidad.
texts.en:
Luis lives with his partner and their 3 year old son and takes care of the family's needs.  He works breeding pigs for butchering.  He learned the work from his father and started his own business 3 years ago, working from Monday to Saturday.  
He wishes to increase the number of pigs he has available for butchering so he's requesting a loan to buy young piglets to breed them and fatten them until they are robsut and can either be sold or butchered.  He hopes to continue working to pay off his debt and change the quality of life of his family.  
His goal is to maintain the continuity of his business so he can have the financial resources to support his son in his university studies.

loans.use: to buy young piglets to breed them and fatten them until they are robsut and can either be sold or butchered.

loans.name: Daysi

texts.es: Doña Daysi tiene una lechería, ha estado dedicada a esta actividad la mayor parte de su vida, necesita un préstamo de  $2.100 para comprar materiales de construcción con el fin de mejorar la infraestructura de la galera de ordeño, ya que de esta manera provocará mayor producción de leche en sus vacas y por ende mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Daysi has a dairy. She has made a living from this activity for the majority of her life. 

She needs a loan of $2,100 to purchase construction materials with the goal of improving the infrastructure of the milking shed, since this will cause an increase in production of milk in her cows and therefore a higher income.

loans.use: to purchase materials to improve the milking shed.

loans.name: Eleuteria

texts.es:
La socia Eleuteria  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su familia,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pollo, verduras, arroz y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member, Eleuteria, continues to work selling food. The member is a hard working woman and through this business wants to provide for her family. The member’s dream is to expand her food business.  The member is requesting the loan to buy chicken, vegetables, rice and meat. The member is happy about the loan and promises to make the loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, vegetables, rice and meat.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is 47 years old and married. For almost 10 years she has been selling handbags, bags and suitcases at a market. She now plans to start another business selling food items so she can increase her income in order to provide the best living conditions to her family. She owns a car in which she transports her products. Josefina is asking for a loan of MXN 5,000 to buy new products to expand her catalogue. She knows how to organize her day so she can fulfill her obligations, share unforgettable moments with her family and also have time to read and listen to music. This way she can be in balance personal as well as professional. 
Josefina likes challenges and is very committed to exceed customers' expectations who always leave with a smile. 
With this loan she will be able to increase sales and income so she can make successful repayments on her first loan with Konfío.

loans.use: to buy new products to expand her catalogue.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies, which will optimize his crop and pay for preparing his land.

loans.name: Kholniso

texts.ru:
Холнисо занимается животноводством у себя во дворе дома. Она занимается этими делами уже более 10 лет. 
Холнисо  проживает в районе Турсунзаде с двумя детьми. В животноводстве Холнисо  также помогают ее дети. Холнисо в основном разводит крупнорогатого скота и в дальнейшем после откорма перепродает их на скотном рынке. В настоящий момент Холнисо просит кредит, чтобы купить несколько крупнорогатого скота и увеличить поголовье скота, и за счет этого увеличить доход от животноводческой деятельности. В будущем Холнисо после успешного погашения данного кредита планирует  получить повторный кредит и расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Kholniso rears animals in her yard at home. She has been engaged in this business for over ten years. Kholniso lives in the Tursunzoda area with two children. Her children also help Kholniso in rearing animals. Kholniso mainly rears cattle and then after fattening them up she resells them at the cattle market. At the moment Kholniso is asking for a loan to buy a few cattle and increase the size of her herd, and as a result of this to increase her income from her animal rearing business. In the future, after successfully repaying this loan Kholniso plans to take another loan and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy cattle for resale.

loans.name: Sharifbek

texts.ru: Мужчина на фотографии это Шарифбек, а помещение его  продуктовый магазин. Он недавно его отремонтировал, чтобы скорее начать новый бизнес. Он семейный человек. Шарифбек вместе отцом, женой и детьми живет на районе Кубадиен.  Он отец двоих маленьких детей.  Шарифбек с детства мечтал стать бизнесменом. Он хочет закупить продукт питания, чтобы открыть свой продуктовый магазин и начать бизнес, но у него маленькая проблема с деньгами. СПо этой причине он обратился за кредитом. Шарифбек ждет, когда настанет открытия нового магазина продуктов питания Шарифбек на районе Кубадиен. Он будет очень рад на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: The man in this picture is Sharifbek, and the room is his grocery, which he has recently renovated so that he can launch his business. Sharifbek is a family man who lives in Qubadiyon with his father, wife and two small children. Sharifbek has dreamed since childhood of becoming a businessman. He would like to buy goods to open his grocery but his own money is not enough, so he is applying for a loan. Sharifbek is looking forward to launching the  grocery “Sharifbek” in Qubadiyon, and he will be grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy food and launch his grocery business

loans.name: Ikromudin

texts.ru: Икромудин  55 лет. Родом он из села Шахритуса. До сегодняшних дней Икромудин живет там же.  Икромудин серьезный и ответственный человек. Он женат и имеет детей. Старший сын уже самостоятельный парень, и он находится загранице, чтобы зарабатывать и помочь родителям обеспечить семью. Его жена занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Сам Икромудин имеет коровник у себя во дворе, поэтому выбрал животноводство, и многие жители района занимается животноводством. Он просит кредит, чтобы купить несколько скота и скорее начать бизнес.  Икромудин заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Ikromudin, 55, lives in Shahrituz. the village where he was born.  Ikromudin is a serious and responsible man. He is married and has children. His elder son is already independent and he is earning money abroad in order to help his parents to provide for the family. Ikromudin's wife makes her living from agriculture. Since Ikromudin owns a cowshed, he decided to breed cattle. Many people in Qubadiyon make their living from livestock breeding. Ikromudin is requesting a loan to increase his herd and launch his business. He would like to thank you in advance.

loans.use: to increase his livestock count and launch his business

loans.name: Shohsanam

texts.ru: Это Шохсанам. Видно, что она шустрая и умная женщина. Шохсанам 34 года. Она бизнес – леди. У Шохсанам большие планы впереди. У нее есть помещение, который она решила открыть магазин по продаже одежды.  Шосанам будет продавать женскую и мужскую одежду. Она отремонтировала помещению и готовила к открытию, но для перевоза одежды у нее не осталось деньги, и Шосанам решила взять кредит и за счет кредита перевозит одежды.  Она с большими надеждами обратилась к Вам за кредитом. Она верит в Вам и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: This is Shohsanam. She appears to be intelligent and nimble. Shohsanam is a 34-year-old businesswoman with big plans for life. She has a room where she would like to open a clothing shop selling both female and male clothing.  She has already renovated it and prepared it for the launch, but she has no money left for transporting the goods. Thus she is requesting a loan. She very much hopes and believes that you will be able to help her.

loans.use: to transport female and male clothing

loans.name: Merci

texts.es: Merci de 53 años, trabajó como empleada doméstica en casa de un familiar, pero consideró que estas labores eran muy arduas y decidió cambiar de actividad. Empezó vendiendo deditos en cada vivienda del barrio donde reside al sur occidente de Barranquilla y con las utilidades invirtió en mercancías varias como perfumes, cremas, talcos, shampoo, electrodomésticos, abanicos y demás. Ella ofrece los productos a sus clientes cada ocho días y programa las citas telefónicamente, así mismo les brinda facilidad de pago.  Su horario laboral es de 4 p.m. a 6 p.m., esta actividad le permite tener más tiempo para dedicarse a su familia.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para cumplir con unos pedidos de perfumes y colonias. Con esta inversión mejorará el surtido y tendrá oportunidad de crecimiento.  Su meta familiar es remodelar su vivienda y en su negocio desea continuar creciendo.
texts.en:
Merci, 53 years old, worked as a domestic worker in the home of a family member, but she considered this work very arduous and she decided change her career. 

She started selling deditos (cheese sticks) in each home in the neighborhood where she lives in the southwest of Barranquilla, and with her profits she invested in a variety of merchandise such as perfumes, creams, talcum powders, shampoo, electrical appliances, fans, and more. She offers her products to her customers every eight days and schedules the meetings by telephone, and likewise she provides them an ease of payment. Her work schedule is from 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. This activity allows her to have more time to focus on her family. 

Currently, she is applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing that she is requesting from the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to fulfill some perfume and cologne orders. With this investment, she will improve her selection and she will have the opportunity for growth. Her family goal is to remodel her home and her work goal is to continue growing.

loans.use: to order perfumes and colognes.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: María Elena es propietaria de la única panadería existente en su comunidad, de esta actividada dependen sus tres hijos menores de edad. Ella está solicitando un préstamo de $2,100, dinero con el cual comprará un horno para generar una mayor producción de pan e incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
María Elena is the owner of the only bakery in her community. Her business provides for her three young children. 

She is requesting a $2,100 loan. She will use this money to buy an oven so that she can produce larger amounts of bread and increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy an oven for her bakery.

loans.name: Tahzeem

texts.en:
Tahzeem is a 27-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is her husband. Tahzeem has been running a business of cattle purchase and sale for the past eight years. After raising small animals for a year or two, she sells them in the local market. 

Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She is a mother of three children. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing. 

To grow her business, she has availed herself of a Murabaha loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase more cattle. She is hopeful that her business will generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Это девушка Гулнора. Она развелась с мужем, и не имеет детей. Гулнора на районе Дж.Руми живет вместе отцом, матерью и сестрой. Она очень спокойная и талантливая девушка. Ей 23 года. У нее средняя образования. Она после окончания не хотела поступить в университет, потому что у нее есть талан. Гулнора хотела заниматься шитьем. Сейчас Гулнора у себя дома предоставляет услуги портнихи. Она шьет женскую одежду на заказ. Гулнора собирается поменять швейную машинку, потому что ее старая машинка устарела. Новая швейная машинка стоит дорого, но у нее не хватает денежных средств, и по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Гулнора заранее выражает свою благодарность на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: This young lady is Gulnora. She is divorced and does not have any children. Gulnora lives in the J. Rumy area with her father, mother and sister. She is a very calm and talented young lady. She is 23 years old. She has a secondary education. After leaving school she did not want to go to university because she has a talent. Gulnora wanted to sew. Now Gulnora provides a tailoring service at home. She sews women's clothes to order. Gulnora is going to change her sewing machine because her old machine is obsolete. A new sewing machine is expensive, but she does not have enough money and so she has applied for a loan. Gulnora expresses her gratitude to you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Ashley

texts.en:
Ashley is applying for a second loan to support his studies through his graduation in December 2015 at the Maharishi Institute. He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan:

“I have been able to become a sidha, an advanced meditator, through the loan. It was able to help me to find the right mode of transport that would bring me to school on time. I am now able to be early for each and every class, and I can buy myself proper clothing for a business environment, and my school fees are up to date."

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en: Shehnaz is a 26-year-old married woman. She has two children. She has been running a business purchasing and selling goats with the help of her husband (also shown in the photo). She looks after them and is responsible for feeding them, while her husband sells them to different markets in the city. Their business is providing them with enough income to support their family. However, she needs to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures including food, health and clothing. In order to expand her earnings, Shehnaz has availed a Murabaha loan of 20,000 PKR to buy more baby goats to sell to expand the business, and that will help in improving her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy more baby goats to sell to expand the business

loans.name: Rapig

texts.en:
Rapig is 50 years old. He lives with his wife in Marneuli district. Rapig is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, he owns a greenhouse and grows vegetables there. He has a harvest two times in a year from the greenhouse and sells it locally at a good price. 

Rapig wants to start a husbandry business along with his agricultural activities. The StartUp program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 3,000 USD. With the received credit, Rapig will purchase cows and will start producing dairy products to sell. This will increase his income, and with increased income Rapig will be able to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase cows and start a husbandry business.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.ru: Дилором 40 летняя жительница района Шахритус. Она семейная женщина, и мать четверых детей. Сыновьям 22, 20, 16 и 15 лет. Ее старшие сыновья находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Дилором на родном районе занимается животноводством и растениеводством уже 10 лет.  У нее имеется коровник и земельный участок. Она любит свою работу и хорошо ухаживает о своих животных и растениях. Дилором покупает скота и откармливает их несколько месяцев, потом перепродает их на скотном рынке. И параллельно выращивает растение. Ей на работе помогает младшие сыновья. Ее муж нашел себе работу загранице, но для билета нет денежных средств. Дилором решила помочь мужу, и хочет взять кредит для билета. У нее нет другого варианта кроме кредит. Поддержите Дилором и ее семью.
texts.en: Dilorom, 40, lives in Shahrituz with her husband and four children. Their sons are 22, 20, 16 and 15 years old. Her elder sons are earning money in Russia. In the past ten years, Dilorom has been breeding livestock and cultivating land. She has a cowshed and a plot of land. She loves what she is doing and takes good care of her livestock and plants. Dilorom buys livestock for fattening up and resells it at the livestock market. Her younger sons help her with her business. Her husband has found a job abroad but he does not have the money to purchase a ticket. Dilorom is requesting a loan in order to help her husband. Please help Dilorom and her family as this loan is her only chance to buy the ticket.

loans.use: to purchase tickets for her husband

loans.name: Vugar

texts.en: Vugar is 31 years old. He lives in Marneuli district with his wife and two children. His children go to a local kindergarten and his wife stays home and looks after the family. Vugar works as a physical worker and gets a daily income. He decided to start his own business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo enables him to get a loan of 3,000 USD. With the received credit, he will purchase a car and start a taxi business. He will be able to generate more income and improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase a car and start a taxi business

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en:
Solomon is applying for a second loan to support his studies through his graduation in December 2015 at the Maharishi Institute. He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan:

“The first Kiva loan has helped me with my studies in a way that I am able to continue being a student at the institute and I am no longer stressing about my fees and transport money. I only focus on my studies, and the academic result has improved since I got the Kiva loan."

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Tinyiko

texts.en:
Tinyiko is applying for a second loan to support his studies through his graduation in December 2015 at the Maharishi Institute. He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan:

“Kiva loan has helped me a lot. It has helped me to cover my tuition fees so that I can be able to finish my qualification. The interesting part is that this is my final year and I am going to graduate. All thanks to Kiva. As a loan beneficiary I would like to thank you for giving me the opportunity to further my degree. It also helped me to be able to come to the institute and attend classes so that I can pass tests, assignment. Furthermore to get a chance to advance and develop myself as a future leader."

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Bulelwa

texts.en: Bulelwa is applying for a second loan to support her studies through her graduation in December 2016 at the Maharishi Institute. She has provided the following update on her progress since receiving the first loan: “The Kiva loan has helped me to cover my educational cost. The first loan has helped me to come to school on time and early and through that I am performing well on my studies".

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Emmah

texts.en: Emmah is applying for a second loan to support her studies through graduation in December 2016 at the Maharishi Institute. She has provided the following update on her progress since receiving the first loan: “My studies have been going very well since the first loan because I focus more on my studies than before when I used to stress about my fees. My academic results have improved because now I focus more on my studies and I have transport money to come to school every day."

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Rockney

texts.en:
Rockney is applying for a second loan to support his studies through his graduation in December 2015 at the Maharishi Institute. He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan: 

"Kiva loan has helped me a lot since my first loan and I am finally graduating this year. As a Kiva beneficiary for the past one year, I will like to thank you for giving me the opportunity to further my studies and also hoping to give back to other students who need this loan in the future, as it makes a difference in many students like me and others who will follow me."

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Mukarram

texts.ru:
Мукаррам трудолюбивая женщина 54 лет. Она замужем и  имеет троих детеё. Она  более 25  лет занимается деканством. Она имеет 9,15 га земельного участка  в дехканском хозяйстве  "Хоча Барно" Она выращивает овощи и пшеницу.   Также она занимается животноводством  .Имеет 12 голов мелко рогатого скота.
Мукаррам  хочет получить кредит. Она обратилась в МДО Арванд.  Она хочет купить минеральные. Она заранее благодарит МДО Арванд зха поддержку.
texts.en: Mukarram, 54, is a hardworking woman. She is married and has three children. She has been cultivating land for over 25 years. She owns a 9.15-ha plot of land in a private farm “Hocha Barno” where she grows vegetables and wheat. She also breeds livestock (12 heads of small cattle). Mukarram is requesting a loan from MDO Arvand to buy mineral fertilizers and she would like to thank you in advance for your help.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Gulshan

texts.en:
Gulshan is a 55-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is her son.

She has been running a business of purchasing and selling animals for many years. She buys baby goats and calves at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them near the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha (a religious event in Muslim countries).

Currently she has availed herself of a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase more baby goats to grow her business. She dreams of providing all facilities to her children through all of her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats to grow her business

loans.name: Kanika

texts.en:
Kanika is 28 years old and a married woman; she has two children. Her husband Ananta is 32 years old. Both of them have completed their education up to grade 5. Her children are also studying in different grades in the small village school of Falakata.

Kanika is a housewife. Her husband sells firewood in the local market. Rural people use firewood in their ovens for cooking purposes. To sell firewood, Kanika's husband needs to purchase a log and cut it into pieces and then sell them in the market. Nowadays, the cost of firewood is going up. Due to lack of sufficient capital, they are unable to purchase large stock of logs. 

Thus Kanika decided to take a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase good quality firewood. She wanted to invest in this business because there is a great demand for firewood in her rural area. Almost every family in her rural area wants good quality firewood for their daily cooking purposes. 

Kanika is sure that she will earn more profit from this business except in the rainy season; there is a possibility of loss in the firewood business in the rainy season. She dreams she will enhance her business in the future and earn more profit from her business. 

Kanika is happy and grateful to Kiva and BJS after getting this loan.

loans.use: To purchase good quality firewood to sell in her rural area.

loans.name: Jan

texts.en:
Jan, age 54, is a married woman and she has five children. One of her sons is also shown in the picture. Her son deals in the business of painting. He is an expert in doing his work and earns a good amount towards fulfilling family needs. 

In order to meet the everyday household expenditures, more income is required, so Jan has taken a Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR for the growth of her son's business. It helped him to purchase a compressor machine to cater to more customers.

loans.use: to purchase a compressor machine to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en: Uzma is a 29-year-old married woman. She deals in a business selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. For the improvement of her business, Uzma has requested a Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to expand her business and income level

loans.name: Jyotasna

texts.en:
41-year-old Jyotasna lives in the village Chuakhola in Falakata, Alipurduar district.  She is married and a mother of three school-going children (two sons and one daughter). She is illiterate and can only sign her name.  Her illiteracy cannot curb her spirit and dedication to provide a better life to her children. She supports her family of five by rearing cattle.  Her children are her greatest motivation for whom she works tirelessly.

Jyotasna 's husband is a cycle-rickshaw puller who has no fixed income.  This was the reason that Jyotasna started her livestock breeding to provide her children with food, health, and education.  She rears dairy cows and sells the milk in her locality.  The money she earns is spent for food expenses. She, hence, feels the need to have a better income and thereby higher savings, to stabilize her financial independence.

She requested BJS (Kiva's parter) for a loan to purchase a dairy cow. There is always a demand for cow milk and she believes her monthly income will increase through this purchase. The loan will enable Jyotasna and her family to have a secure and dignified life and the best education for her children. She has a long-cherished dream to upgrade their mud and bamboo made house and she hopes the loan will help her to proceed one step closer towards her dream.

She conveys her gratitude to the lenders.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for her milk selling business.

loans.name: Lefa

texts.en: Lefa is applying for a second loan to support his studies through his graduation in December 2015 at the Maharishi Institute. He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan: “As a student, Kiva has really helped and I am really motivated about what Kiva has done for me. I am doing well academically, as I have managed to pass all of my courses".

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Clelia Cecilia

texts.es:
Clelia, fabrica ropa para vender y por encargo, vive con sus hijos, desarrolla actividades domésticas y atiende sola el negocio, desde hace varios años ha practicado este oficio para poder llevar el sustento a su familia, por el momento no se ve que tenga inconvenientes para continuar trabajando.
Considerando que en su negocio le hace falta un mejor inventario para que sea más competitivo, decidió solicitar un crédito para comprar telas, encajes, listones, elásticos, botones, broches, tijeras, etc., con estos materiales mejorara la productividad y calidad de prendas de vestir que ofrece en su negocio.
Su visión es administrar de buena manera el crédito, ampliar su negocio y que sea autosostenible.
texts.en:
Clelia makes clothes to sell and to fulfill her orders. She lives with her children, takes care of the household chores and tends to her business by herself. She has been doing this for various years in order to support her family. Currently, she does not anticipate having any problems to continue working.

Considering that her business needs to have a better inventory to be more competitive, she decided to request a loan to purchase fabrics, lace, ribbons, elastic, buttons, clasps, scissors, etc. With these materials she will improve her productivity and the quality of the clothing to offer in her business. Her vision is to administer the loan in a good manner, expand and make her business self-sustainable.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, lace, ribbons, elastic, buttons, clasps, scissors, etc., with these materials she will improve her productivity and quality of the clothing.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru:
Гулбахор молодая и жизнерадостная женщина 36 лет.  Она родилась в семье рабочего. Гулбахор замужем и имеет 6 -х детей. Супруги живут не богато и не бедно, но счастливо.  Гулбахор живет вместе с семьёй в доме, который построили сами. Гулбахор очень трудолюбивая женщина. Она занимается торговлей женской одежды.
Гулбахор хочет расширить свой бизнес. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Она заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку
texts.en: Gulbahor is a young and cheerful 36-year-old woman who was born to a working class family. She is married and has six children. The couple is neither rich nor poor, but they are happy. Gulbahor’s family lives in a house that they built themselves. Gulbahor is a very hardworking woman. She makes her living from selling female clothing. She is requesting a loan from Arvand to expand her business, and she is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy goods for sale

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en:
Khalida is a 55-year-old married woman. She is the mother of four children. One of her sons is also shown in the photo.

She has been running a business of purchasing and selling goats. After raising small animals for a year or two, she sells them out to different markets in the city. Her business is providing her with enough income to support her family. However, she needs to earn much more to meet everyday expenditures of her family, including food, health and clothing.

In order to expand her earnings, Khalida has availed herself of a Murabaha loan of 40,000 PKR to buy more baby goats. In addition to increasing her earnings, it will also help her in improving her family’s living standards.

loans.use: to buy more baby goats to increase her earnings

loans.name: Kulsoom

texts.en: Kulsoom is a 47-year-old, hardworking woman who has three children. Her husband is also shown in the photo. For the last four years, she has been providing the service of stitching clothes in her locality. She is quite popular for her skills in stitching. Kulsoom’s work brought the family out of a financial crisis that they were facing when she started working. Over the years, she has established a good clientele. Currently, she has availed a Murabaha loan of 15,000 PKR to purchase a new stitching machine with some spools of threads and laces. She dreams of providing a better standard of living to her family members through all her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine with some spools of threads and laces.

loans.name: Lubna

texts.en: Lubna is a 41-year-old married woman. The man shown in the picture is her husband. Three years ago, she started a business selling cloth in her locality. She purchases cloth of different varieties at low prices from the city market and sells them in her own town. She has a strong customer base. Currently, Lubna has requested a Murabaha loan of 30,000 Pakistan rupees (PKR). She wants to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a 40-year-old married woman, and the mother of four children. Her husband, some time ago started a van driving business. He owns one van and needs some financial help. He will use the amount to pay for repair and maintenance costs of the van, to provide better services to his customers. 

Therefore, Amina has availed herself of a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR for her husband. She is hopeful that her husband’s business will prosper and their living standards will improve.

loans.use: to help her husband to pay for repair and maintenance costs of the van, to provide better services to his customers.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба молодая женщина 1976 года рождение. Она   замужем   и имеет 4-х детей . Она  работает уборщицей  в городской больнице, муж её работает плотником. Она очень трудолюбивый человек, трудится не покладая рук для обеспечение родных всем необходимым. Этого дохода хватает Махбубе на проживание. Но у неё есть мечта, Махбуба хочет построить большой дом для своей семьи. Но для этого ей необходимы денежные средства. То, что она и муж зарабатывают не достаточно, чтобы позволить себе построение нового дома. Поэтому Махбуба обратилась в Арванд и  хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Махбуба надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en: Mahbuba is a young woman who was born in 1976. She is married and has four children. She works as a cleaner at a municipal hospital and her husband works as a carpenter.  She works hard to provide for her family and her income is just enough to cover living expenses. However, Mahbuba would like her family to live in a big house. Since Mahbuba and her husband do not earn enough money for building a new house, she is requesting a loan from Arvand to buy building materials. She hopes for a good outcome and is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Petrona

texts.en:
Petrona lives in a community in the Department of Copan Honduras. She is a farmer (Corn and Beans) since 25 years ago. Age 52 years; she is married and has three children. It is clear that Petrona works hard to maintain her family and at night, after a hard day of work, the conditions in the house are not very good due to the lack of electricity. She hopes that with the solar energy system, her children will be able to continue studying and improve the living conditions.
Petrona is requesting a loan to purchase a complete solar electric system from SOLUZ Honduras, that will permit to have a better lighting, charge her cell phones, and saving in traditional energy expenditure.

loans.use: to purchase a solar home system that will allow her to reduce spending in kerosene, candles, and improve the home lighting.

loans.name: Farangis

texts.ru:
Фарангис молодая женщина 23 лет. Она замужем и имеет двух детей. Фарангис по профессии швея. Он шьет национальные платья и получает заказы на дом. Её муж мастер строитель.  
В данное время Фарангис вместе со своим мужем хотят отремонтировать дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Фарангис обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта  дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Farangis is a 23-year-old young woman. She is married and has two children. A tailor by trade, she works from home, making national costumes. Her husband is a construction worker. Farangis and her husband would like to improve their living conditions by renovating their house, so she is requesting a loan from Arvand to buy building materials. She hopes for a good outcome and is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm implements such as jembes (hoes) and farm inputs such as fertilizers for a better harvest to sell and for family use.

loans.name: Elda Marleny

texts.en:
Elda Marleny lives in a community in the Department of Copan Honduras. She is a farmer (Corn and coffee) since 16 years ago. Age 34 years; she is married and has one child. It is clear that Elda Marleny works hard to maintain her family and at night, after a hard day of work, the conditions in the house are not very good due to the lack of electricity. She hopes that with the solar energy system, her child will be able to continue studying and improve the living conditions.
Elda Marleny is requesting a loan to purchase a complete solar electric system from SOLUZ Honduras, that will permit to have a better lighting, charge her cell phones, and saving in traditional energy expenditure.

loans.use: to purchase a solar home system that will allow her to reduce spending in kerosene, candles, and improve the home lighting.

loans.name: Gulandom

texts.ru:
Гуландом молодая и трудолюбивая женщина 42 лет. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Она по профессии швея. Она шьёт национальные платьев. Так как сеёчас сезон свадеб , у неё много заказов на пошив. Гуландом очень лбюбит свою работу. 
В данное время Гуландом вместе со своим мужем хотят отремонтировать дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Гуландом обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Gulandom, 42, is a young, hardworking woman. She is married and has two children. A tailor by trade, she makes national costumes. Since it is a wedding season, she currently receives many orders. Gulandom loves her job. Gulandom and her husband would like to improve their living conditions by renovating their house, so she is requesting a loan from Arvand to buy construction materials. She hopes for a good outcome and is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Mumina

texts.ru:
Мумина родилась в   1975 году. Она замужем и имеет шестерых детей. Она очень трудолюбивая жещина. Он около 10 лет занимается выращиванием селхозкультуры. Также она занимается животноводством. Её муж мастер строитель.
В данное время Мумина вместе со своим мужем хотят отремонтировать дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Мумина обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Mumina, born in 1975, is married and has six children. She is a very hardworking woman. She has been cultivating land for about 10 years. Her additional income comes from livestock breeding. Her husband is a construction worker. Mumina and her husband would like to improve their living conditions by renovating their house, so she is requesting a loan from Arvand to buy building materials. She hopes for a good outcome and is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Munojot

texts.ru:
Муножот  умная,  трудолюбивая женщина в возрасте 27 лет. Она замужнем  и имеет  троих детей. По профессию она учительница.  Она работает в сельской школе. Её Муж занимается животноводством. 
Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Муножот вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Муножот выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Муножот получает хороший доход.  Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Муножот с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Муножот заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en: Munozhot, 27, is an intelligent, hardworking woman. She is married and has three children. Munozhot works as a teacher at a village school and her husband makes a living from livestock breeding. In order to have a permanent income, Munozhot and her husband started their own livestock breeding business.  Munozhot makes a good profit from fattening up livestock and selling meat and milk.  Their total income is enough to keep up an average living standard but so far they have been unable to meet all of their financial needs. Munozhot is requesting a loan from Arvand to buy more cattle and improve her family's living standard. Munozhot is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Nodirsho

texts.ru: Нодиршо простой и спокойный человек. Он отец троих детей. Дети еще маленькие.  Ему 30 лет. Нодиршо из района Шахритус. Он в районе живет вместе отцом, матерью, сестренкой, женой и детьми. В Шахритусе прекрасная погода, свежий воздух, есть все условия для развития животноводства. И он уже 4 года занимается выращиванием скота. Нодиршо уже хорошо справляется со своей работой. Сейчас он планирует купить пару голов крупнорогатых скотов и от их доходов приобрести еще пару голов скота и увеличить поголовье скота. Но только финансы не позволяют. И он просит кредит. Это кредит поможет ему расширить животноводства. У Нодиршо большие планы в будущем. Поддержите Нодирщо финансовыми трудностями.
texts.en: Nodirsho, 30, is a simple and quiet man. He is a father of three small children. He comes from Shahrituz where he lives with his father, mother, younger sister, wife and children. Shahrituz has wonderful weather, fresh air and all the other conditions necessary for livestock breeding. Nodirsho has been breeding livestock for four years, and he is good at what he is doing.  He is requesting a loan that would allow him to increase his herd and further expand his business. Nodirsho has big plans for life. Please help him to solve his financial problems.

loans.use: to buy more cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more medicine wholesale.

loans.name: Phindile

texts.en:
Phindile is applying for a loan to support her studies for a year at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU). This is her story: 

1.What do you study at Maharishi Institute? Which classes you enjoy most?
I am studying towards a Bachelor of Arts degree in Management. The classes which I enjoy the most are Marketing Management, Business Law and Ethics, and Career Strategies to name a few. However, I would say all my classes have been pleasant and I have learned and grown with each one of them.

2.What are your goals after graduating from the Institute? Please be specific: In which sector do you expect to work? In which city would you like to work? Would you like to travel?
I am fascinated by property, design and organizing. Therefore, my five-year plan includes working as an events coordinator, consulting in marketing and advertising and owning properties in Bedworth, part of which I will later develop into communes.

3.Tell us about your background. Where were you born? Do you have brothers and sisters? What do your parents do for work? Are you married? Do you have children?
I was born and briefly raised in Sharpville until my parents divorced.  After, my sister and I moved quite until recent settlement in Soweto. 

4.What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to read motivational books and watch movies. 

5.How will a Kiva loan change your life? Describe how the loan will affect your studies and your lifestyle: Will there be significant changes?
It will supplement my transport and help me cover other living expenses, especially given that my mother is the sole breadwinner taking care of my siblings, her son, a grandmother, my father, and me. My lifestyle will improve because I will have more time to focus on my studies and time to network in order to secure my future. This is opposed to the stress and worry that I am usually used to.

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU).

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru:
Наргиза молодая и трудолюбивая женщина 35 лет. Она замужем мужем и имеет четырех детей. Её семья живет  в собственном доме в Ганчинском районе в кишлаке  Янгиарик. Женщина  с средним  образованием . Наргиза по профессии швея. Она  с детства любила шить , и сейчас это основной источник дохода для проживание её семьи. Её муж разнорабочим на стройке и этим зарабатывает на жизнь. Она очень  хорошая , добрая  и к своей  семье  любящая женщина.  Она очень стремительный и трудолюбивый человек 
В данное время Наргиза вместе со своим мужем хотят отремонтировать дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Наргиза обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта  дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Nargiza is a young, hardworking 35-year-old woman. She is married and has four children. Her family lives in their own house in Yangiarik village of the Gonchi region. Nargiza has a high school diploma and is a tailor by trade. Passionate about sewing since childhood, she has turned it into her family’s primary source of income. Her husband makes a living from odd jobs in construction. Nargiza is a very good and kind woman who loves her family. She is a very purposeful and hardworking person. Nargiza and her husband would like to improve their living conditions by renovating their house, so she is requesting a loan from Arvand to buy building materials. She hopes for a good outcome and is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Vuyiswa

texts.en:
Vuyiswa is applying for a loan to support her studies for a year at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU). This is her story: 

1.What do you study at Maharishi Institute? Which classes you enjoy most?
I enjoy managing for sustainability and managerial account. I enjoy these courses because they are challenging and we learn how to manage finance and how to live sustainably.

2.What are your goals after graduating from the Institute? Please be specific: In which sector do you expect to work? In which city would you like to work? Would you like to travel?
My goal after graduating, I want to work for a corporate company, in Johannesburg, in the human resource department. Yes, I would love to travel the world especially to America to see how people there live.

3.Tell us about your background. Where were you born? Do you have brothers and sisters? What do your parents do for work? Are you married? Do you have children?
My name is Vuyiswa and I am 24 years old. I was born in South Africa in the Eastern Cape Province. I have five sisters, only my older sister works, the others are still in high school. My twin sister graduated last year with a management diploma. I will be the first one to have a degree. Neither of my parents are working. I’m not married and I have no kids

4.What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like reading and watching TV. When I’m at home during the school holiday I like to spend time with my family or visit relatives and go to church.

5.How will a Kiva loan change your life? Describe how the loan will affect your studies and your lifestyle: will there be significant changes?
The Kiva loan will help me pay my school fees. The monthly stipend will help me with my personal needs. The Kiva loan will make a huge significant change in my fees. I won’t be stressed anymore about how I am going to pay the fees or any basic needs. I will now have a stress-free life.

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU).

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru: Сайёра 29 летняя жительница района Н.Хусрав. Она замужем и мать троих детей. Детьям 7, 4 и 1 лет. Ее дети еще маленькие. Ее муж занимается мастером по ремонте домов.  Сайёра присматривает за  детьми, и занимается животноводством у себя дома. Ей одному тяжело заниматься животноводством, но она старается, чтобы зарабатывать и прокормить детей. Животноводческая деятельность является основной, потому что доход от этого бизнеса обеспечивает семью. Сайёра обратилась за кредитом, потому что у нее осталось малое количество скотов, чтобы сохранить деятельность и увеличить поголовья скота Сайёра необходимо определенная сумма денег. Она намерена на заемные средства приобрести скотов и сохранить бизнес.
texts.en: Sayora, 29, lives in Nosiri Khusrav. She is married and has three children who are 7, 4 and 1 years old. While her husband earns a living by renovating houses, Sayora looks after the children and breeds livestock. Breeding livestock all by herself is not easy, but she works hard to put bread on the table. Livestock breeding is her primary source of income because she finds it profitable. Sayora is requesting a loan because she needs to restore her livestock count and keep her business running.

loans.use: to buy livestock and keep her business running

loans.name: Mamazarif

texts.ru: Мамазариф серьезный и ответственный человек. Ему 47 лет. Он житель района Кубадиен. У Мамазариф сын и две дочки. Дочкам 19 и 18 лет. Жена домохозяйка. Мамазариф 10 лет назад решил освоить деятельность отца и идти по его стопам. Он сейчас тоже занимается растениеводством. У него имеется не большой участок земли рядом с домом. В течение 10 лет Мамазариф постоянно сажает урожай. В этом году он хочет посадить урожай арбуз. И активно готовится к посеву. Мамазариф на заемные деньги решил купить семена арбуз и минеральные удобрения. У него не получился собрать достаточную сумму денег для приобретения средств для посева и у него вся надежда остается на кредит.
texts.en: Mamazarif is an earnest, responsible 47-year-old man who lives in Qubadiyon with his son and two daughters. The daughters are 19 and 18 years old. Mamazarif’s wife is a homeworker. Ten years ago Mamazarif decided to follow in his father’s footsteps and start cultivating land.  He now owns a large plot of land adjacent to his house. In the past ten years Mamazarif has always planted crops, and this year he would like to plant watermelons. He is actively preparing for the sowing season. Mamazarif would use the loan for buying watermelon seeds and mineral fertilizers. He would not be able to buy the seeds and fertilizers without this loan.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and watermelon seeds

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 23 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de ropa de manera ambulante por las diferentes colonias y pueblos aledaños, tiene 5 años de experiencia en las ventas inicio con las ventas a causa del desempleo, la joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la comprar de mas ropa por mayor para continuar con sus ventas y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The young woman (whose face is blurred because she is 23 years old and lives in a high-risk area) works as a street vendor selling clothing in nearby settlements and villages. She has been selling clothing for 5 years, and began this work as a result of unemployment. The young woman lives in a home owned by her family, and is requesting a loan to buy more clothing wholesale and increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy more clothing wholesale

loans.name: Tholoana

texts.en:
Tholoana is applying for a loan to support her studies for a year at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU). This is her story: 

1.What do you study at Maharishi Institute? Which classes you enjoy most?
I’m studying Bachelor of Arts, in management. I enjoyed marketing management class. It allows me to express my creativity and to communicate with others. I have a strong passion in working with people.

2.What are your goals after graduating from the Institute? Please be specific: In which sector do you expect to work? In which city would you like to work? Would you like to travel?
I want to work and get more work experience and skills. I also plan to further my studies. I would like to work in the marketing company based in any province here in South Africa. I would like to travel and see other countries.

3.Tell us about your background. Where were you born? Do you have brothers and sisters? What do your parents do for work? Are you married? Do you have children?
I was born in Matatiele, Eastern Cape. I have one brother and two sisters. I was raised by my mother. My father left us when I was five years old and I have never heard of him since then. My mother is unemployed therefore she supports us with child grant. I have no kids of my own and not married. I want to get a nice job so that I can support my family.

4.What do you like to do in your spare time?
In my spare time I like to read books (novels, newspapers and so forth) and do research in anything that I find it interesting.

5.How will a Kiva loan change your life? Describe how the loan will affect your studies and your lifestyle: will there be significant changes?
Kiva loan will really help me with reducing paying my school fees and the stipend will help me with the basic needs since my mother is unemployed. It will change my studies because I will be able to buy the stationery and my mother won’t have to borrow money for me.

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU).

loans.name: Palesa

texts.en:
Palesa is applying for a loan to support her studies for a year at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU). This is her story: 

1.What do you study at the Maharishi Institute? Which classes do you enjoy the most?
I am studying to receive a Bachelor of Arts. The classes I enjoy the most are marketing and statistics. 

2.What are your goals after graduating from the Maharishi Institute? Please be specific: in which sector do you expect to work? In which city would you like to work? Would you like to travel?
My goal is to start my own company. The sector in which I expect to work in is marketing. I would like to travel all over the world and the city I wish to work in is Johannesburg.

3.Tell us about your background. Where were you born? Do you have brothers and sisters? What do your parents do for work? Are you married; do you have children?
I was born in Baragwaneth; I have one brother and no sisters. My mother is unemployed. I am not married and do not have children of my own.

4.What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to read novels, write poems, go out with my friends and watch movies in my spare time. 

5.How will Kiva loan change your life? Describe how the loan will affect your studies and your lifestyle: will there be significant changes?
The Kiva loan will change my life in a beneficial way because I will use the money for transport and for basic needs like toiletries.

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU).

loans.name: M.d. Ajita

texts.en:
Ajita is an active and energetic woman who always works hard for her family’s well-being. She is 33 years old, married and lives at Chuakhola village in Alipurduar district of West Bengal. She is a mother of three children (one daughter and two sons). Her children are studying in different grades in a nearby village school.

Her husband is a farmer by occupation. He grows different kinds of vegetables and sells them in the local vegetable trade. Ajita assists her husband in this activity. Now they wish to cultivate steam amaranth leaf (locally known as data shak) on their land to generate more income. This crop is in much demand in the local area; thus they decided to grow this steam amaranth leaf.

Ajita is confident that she will be able to grow her business, so she took a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase necessary farm supplies to cultivate steam amaranth leaf. She hopes she can improve her family’s financial status as well as bear all educational costs for her children from the profit generated by this new cultivation. She dreams to buy more agricultural land in the future for the expansion of their business.

Ajita is grateful to BJS and Kiva for helping her.
