Cette année Bakaye effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro d'engrais pour la culture de maïs  afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 1 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 18 ans que Bakaye cultive le maïs pour sa valeur vivrière et aussi pour sa valeur commerciale, car le maïs est un aliment qu'il vend sur le marché. Bakaye planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de faire de l'élevage comme et de pouvoir faire du commerce. Enfin Bakaye espère aussi pouvoir construire une maison pour la famille ainsi qu'assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en:
Bakaye is on the right of the photo holding a packet from N'gaSene. He is member of a group of nine crop farmers enrolled in myAgro, who live and work in the village of Kabe, to the south of Bamako, in Mali.

34-year-old Bakaye is the father of two children from one to three years of age, none of whom currently attend school. The family tradition is anchored in the practice of agriculture, as the main source of income and food self-sufficiency for the home.  The ability to generate income in support of his main occupation is what motivated Bakaye to practice agriculture for over 18 years.

Bakaye grows maize, sorghum, and market vegetables on his parcel of land, but faces difficulties as a farmer such as the lack of rain, agricultural equipment and quality fertilizer. Bakaye is entering his second year with myAgro and renewed his application because of the payment system, but also for the quality of seeds and fertilizer.

This year Bakaye is making payments to buy a bag of myAgro fertilizer to cultivate maize, to increase crop yields on his one hectare plot (2.47 acres).

For the past 18 years Bakaye has cultivated maize for its crop and commercial value, because maize is a product he sells at the market.

With increased yields and income Bakaye would like to raise livestock and become a merchant. Finally Bakaye also hopes to build a family home as well as ensure his family's nutritional self-sufficiency.

loans.use: buy a bag of fertilizer to cultivate maize

loans.name: Josie

texts.en:
Josie is 57 years old and married with three children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of household goods to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc. She has been in this business for 7 years. 

In the future Josie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of household goods to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita is a widowed woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 62 years old now.

Esterlita has a buy-and-sell coconut wine business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell. She has been in this business for 42 years. 

In the future, Esterlita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more containers of coconut wine to sell

loans.name: April Marie

texts.en:
April Marie is 28 years old and single. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

She has a general store business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell. She has been in this business for six years. 

In the future, April Marie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Gaudencia

texts.en:
Gaudencia is a 55-year-old married woman with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Gaudencia has a buy-and-sell beverage business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more beverages to sell. She has been in this business for 2 years. 

In the future, Gaudencia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more beverages to sell

loans.name: Anabelle

texts.en:
Anabelle is a 44-year-old married woman with five children, three of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Anabelle has a fish vending business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 28,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell. She has been in this business for 15 years. 

In the future, Anabelle would like to save enough money to expand her business and to continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: La Gloire De Dieu Group

texts.fr: Groupement de 16 personnes(08 femmes et 08 hommes), LA GLOIRE DE DIEU exerce son activité à ANEHO localité située à environ 45km de la ville de Lomé. Ils sont spécialisés dans l'agriculture et achète les intrants à ATTITOGON. Pour acheter des intrants et payer la main d’œuvre, ce groupement demande un cinquiéme prêt à WAGES pour atteindre leurs objectifs. Chaque membre du groupe souhaite améliorer son activité et assurer la scolarité et la santé de leurs enfants. Nottons que le responsable du groupe à 59ans, père de 04 enfants. Il est spécialisé dans la culture du mais, du manioc, de la tomate et du piment.
texts.en:
The "Gloire de Dieu" group consists of 16 persons (eight women and eight men) operating in Aneho, which is located about 45 kilometers from the city of Lome. They specialize in agriculture and buy agricultural inputs from Attitogon.

To purchase agricultural inputs and pay for labor, this group is requesting a fifth loan from WAGES to achieve their goals. Each group member wants to improve their business and ensure their children's education and health.

Please note that the group leader is 59 years old, and the father of four children. He specializes in cultivatiing maize, cassava, tomatoes and hot peppers.

loans.use: buy agricultural inputs and pay for labor

loans.name: Assileassime Group

texts.fr: Groupement de 15 personnes, ASSILEASSIME exerce son activité à ANEHO localité située à environ 45km de la ville de Lomé. Ils sont spécialisés dans la vente du mais et savon local. Pour acheter des intrants, ce groupement demande un premier prêt à WAGES pour atteindre leurs objectifs. Chaque membre du groupe souhaite améliorer son activité et assurer la scolarité et la santé de leurs enfants. Nottons que le responsable du groupe à 52ans.
texts.en:
The Assileassime group consists of 15 persons operating in Aneho, which is located about 45 kilometers from the city of Lome. They specialize in selling maize and locally-made soap.

To purchase agricultural inputs, this group is requesting a first loan from WAGES to achieve their goals. Each group member wants to improve their business and ensure their children's education and health.

Please note that the group leader is 52 years old.

loans.use: buy agricultural inputs and various items

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy onions

loans.name: Paz

texts.en:
Paz, aged 60, is from Calube, Aloran, Philippines. She is married with 4 children.  

Paz joined PMPC and she appreciates the programs and services of the Coop. The Coop supported her by providing the capital to start her snack vending business. In order to help her family to survive, she gives the best of her ability to make delicious food snacks that will sell out. 

Paz is now trying to expand her resources, so she has decided to engage in swine production. She presented her project proposal to Paglaum MPC for financing for the project, and she has applied for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy a piglet and build a concrete pig pen. She is thankful to Paglaum MPC for financing her capital needs. In addition, she wants her business to be well-known and to build good business management practices for her loyal customers.  

With her extra income, she wishes to live a happy and comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy a piglet and build a concrete pig pen

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy pagnes wax (colorful West-African fabric)

loans.name: Amada

texts.en:
Amada is 48 years old and married with six children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her store.

Amada has borrowed and repaid 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from farming vegetables.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Lezel

texts.en:
Lezel is a hardworking woman and entrepreneur with one child.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

She also industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like pig fattening. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now has requested another loan to further build her businesses. 

Lezel dreams that one day she will be able to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy potatoes

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn has a small coconut farm in Aloran, Philippines, from which she earns a good income every quarter for her family to survive. 

To generate additional earnings, she wants to plant bananas and grow root crops. Jocelyn makes it a point to do good land preparation in order to have maximum yield and a good income. She recently needed a loan to pay for the clearing and plowing of land, and the holing and planting of seedlings, so she borrowed from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative. 

Jocelyn wishes to have more produce and to be able to supply agri-products in the market.

loans.use: to pay for the clearing and plowing of land, and the holing and planting of seedlings

loans.name: Aquillo

texts.en:
Aquillo operates a motor transport business.  His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. 

He earns a minimum of 400 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every day. For him to continue his business, he has asked for a loan to pay for spare parts and repairs to his motorbike. 

He dreams of owning more motor units and to be able to provide for his family.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and repairs for his motorbike.

loans.name: Dionesio

texts.en:
Dionesio is married and lives in Aloran, Philippines. 

For a living, he engages in buying and selling firewood in the local community, and he has been doing this for 25 years. He hopes to live comfortably with a decent house. 

Dionesio has applied for a loan to pay for more loads of firewood to sell retail. He wants nothing more than to live a happy and healthy life.

He is a new member of PMPC, and in the future he hopes to save money for future emergencies.

loans.use: to pay for more loads of firewood to sell retail

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy clothing (pagnes wax)

loans.name: Nonita

texts.en: Nonita is a strong-willed woman who pushes her ability when it comes to her pig business. She is a hands-on businesswoman and mother who never gets tired supporting her family. Recently, she availed herself of a loan to purchase bags of pig feed. Aside from her project of concreting the pig pens, she thought of offering pig heads for commercial sale. Someday she hopes to open a meat shop in a nearby town.

loans.use: to purchase bags of pig feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in chicken, free-range hen, feedstuffs and vitamins for breeding and sales

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos, es dueña de una granja de pollos y de cerdos, negocio que fundo hace 10 años, no cuenta con horario fijo de trabajo, desde las primeras horas del día inicia sus labores alimentando los cerdos y luego los pollos; se encuentra acompañada, uno de sus hijos de 20 años de edad aún vive con ella, los demás ya son independientes.
Comprará cerdos pequeños, concentrado para los cerdos y los pollos, alimentara a los animales para mantenerlos saludables y que sea más fácil venderlos en las mejores temporadas de venta durante el año, con la inversión busca tener mejores ingresos para resarcir sus deudas y tener un mejor estilo de vida.
Desea tener siempre su negocio activo y hacer mejoras en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Santos is the owner of a farm of pigs and chickens, a business she founded 10 years ago. She does not have fixed hours of work. From the first hours of the day she begins her labor by feeding the pigs and later the chickens. She is accompanied by one of her children, who is 20 years old and still lives with her. The other children are now independent. 

She will purchase small pigs and feedstuffs for pigs and chickens. She will feed the animals to maintain their health so it will be easier to sell them during the best sales season of the year. With the investment, she seeks to have a better income to repay her debt and to have a better way of life. 

She hopes to always have her business active and to make improvements in her house.

loans.use: to purchase small pigs, feedstuffs for pigs and chickens; to feed animals to maintain their health so it will be easier to sell them

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy various items

loans.name: Maclovia

texts.es:
Doña Maclovia tiene 45 años de residir en la misma casa. Le urge mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, 
específicamente el techado. Con un préstamo de $250 comprará el material y pagará la mano de obra, lo cual le permitirá vivir mejor.
texts.en: Doña Maclovia has been living in the same house for 45 years. It is urgent for her to improve the conditions of her housing, specifically the roof. With the loan of $250 she will buy material and pay for labor, which will allow her to live better.

loans.use: to improve her housing

loans.name: Nga

texts.en:
Mrs Nga has a retail business selling cake, sugar and salt. Nga has been involved in this business for 6 years. Nga is 32 years old and she is married with 3 children. She lives and works in Hau Loc district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nga's first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Nga hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is a businesswoman in Tangub City. She is 50 years old, married and a microfinance member of PMPC. 

Mercy is engaged in a slipper-making business. Running this type of business has supported her family, especially her children's education. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase more materials such as fabrics to be used for her slipper-making business. Mercy believes having enough inventory will allow her to cater to her customers' needs. She is thankful that she has signed up for membership with PMPC as her financing partner.

loans.use: to purchase more materials such as fabrics to be used for her slipper-making business.

loans.name: Franklin

texts.es: Franklin es un joven no vidente, pero con fuerte espíritu emprendedor. Sueña con adquirir un hato de ganado para lechería. Solicita un préstamo de $400 para comprar una novilla holstein, e iniciar así su proyecto. Con esto pretende generar ingresos a futuro para sostenerse y crear un negocio de lechería.
texts.en: Franklin is a young man. He is blind but has a strong enterprising spirit. He dreams of buying a herd of cows for milk. He is applying for this loan of $400 in order to buy a Holstein heifer and start his business. Franklin plans to use this loan in order to earn an income to support himself and start a milk business.

loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 41 years old and married with five children, three of whom are in school. Lorna works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of household goods to sell like soap, shampoo, eggs, noodles, etc.

Lorna has been in this business for 23 years.

In the future Lorna would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of household goods to sell like soap, shampoo, eggs, noodles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, anti-disease treatments and other necessary farming supplies to grow corn.

loans.name: 031406150001.thiệu Khánh Group

texts.en:
Mrs Nga has a service business tailoring clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Nga is 48 years old and she is married with 2 children.  She is the leader of a 4-member group, the 031406150001.Thiệu Khánh solidarity group. 
She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2011, Nga joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. Nga has successfully repaid 4 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.  Nga has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nga hopes for her business to do well, to maintain  a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn hails from the town of Antequera, Bohol. She is  43 year old  married woman with two children ages 6 and 8 year old respectively. She engages in a food vending business. She prepares snack food like donuts and also sells bread and mangoes.  In her home, she also has a small variety store that sells items like sugar, cooking oil, canned goods, soap and many others.  

She has requested a loan to buy groceries for the store and additional capital for food vending, like flour, sugar and edible oil.  These ingredients will be used in making bread, and she will sell it in her local community. With these, she will be able to expand her business and start to handle her finances. She could also support the schooling of her children.

Jocelyn is determined to handle her business to become successful and self sustainable as well.

loans.use: to buy groceries for the store and additional capital for food vending

loans.name: Jolita

texts.en:
Jolita is 38 years old and has three children. Jolita is married and has three children who are in school.

Jolita is in the agricultural business  in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Jolita has been in this business for 15 years now, and has borrowed 9 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Jolita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Dionilin

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Dionilin works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Dionilin is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to purchase spare parts and accessories for her motorcycle for her motorcycle transport business.

Dionilin has been sustaining her business activities through her past 15 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and accessories for her motorcycle

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is 63 years old and has five children. Josefina is a widow.

Josefina is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 9000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Josefina has been in this business for 41 years now, and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Josefina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Ma. Erlanie

texts.en:
Ma. Erlanie is 37 years old and married with three children who are in school, Ma. Erlanie works very hard to provide for them.

She buys and sells charcoal in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy sacks of charcoal to sell.

Ma. Erlanie has been in this business for 1 year.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to sell to provide a future for her family

loans.name: Nhóm 03 Thôn Tiên Thắng Quảng Lợi Group

texts.en:
Mrs Huê works in agriculture raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase more chicks to raise and sell in the future.

Huê is 33 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 03 thôn Tiên Thắng Quảng Lợi solidarity group, which consists of 3 members and who live and work in Quang Xuong district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Huê joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid 4 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Huê has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Huê faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Huê hopes for her business to do well, to build a new house, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is a 52-year-old married woman from Sta Cruz, Tangub City, who has five children. She has been a member of the Paglaum-MPC for almost four years. 

Editha owns and manages a small food stall in front of their house, which is on a national road that many people pass through looking for places to eat. 

Due to the improvements to their city, many people travel in and out of the vicinity, so she has decided to expand her business to cook more dishes in order to draw more people to visit her eatery. 

To fund this project, she needs additional capital, so she has requested a loan from Paglaum-MPC.

loans.use: to pay for more meat and spices in to cook more dishes in order to draw more people to visit her food stall

location.town: Tangub-P3 Sta. Cruz, Tangub City, Mindanao

loans.name: Victor Alfonso

texts.es:
Víctor, está acompañado, pero aún no tiene hijos, solamente viven dos en su casa, su negocio consiste en administrar una mini tienda de productos varios, bebidas y ropa usada, el oficio lo aprendió de su madre, al fallecer él decidió resurtir el negocio e incluyo otros productos, ya tiene más de un año de tener su negocio.
Necesita de capital para comprar bebidas, boquitas, pan, granos básicos, pastas, etc., fortalecerá la tienda con nuevos productos para atraer nuevos clientes y aumentar sus ventas, pretende continuar mejorando el negocio para cumplir con sus obligaciones.
Víctor tiene como proyecto lograr tener un negocio más competitivo, reconstruir su vivienda y tener en su hogar menos necesidades.
texts.en:
Victor has a partner but no children yet, so only two live at home.  He runs a mini-market and sells a variety of products, beverages and used clothing.  He learned the trade from his mother.  When she passed away he decided to restock the business and include other products.  He has been in business for over a year.

He is in need of capital to buy beverages, snacks, bread, basic grains, pastas, etc. to strengthen his store with new products and attract new customers to increase sales.  He wants to continue improving the business so he can meet his obligations.

Victor's goal is to become more competitive, build a house and have a home with fewer needs.

loans.use: To buy beverages, snacks, bread, basic grains, pastas, etc. to strengthen his store and attract new customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cement, sand, gravel, brick and metal sheeting to finish building his house.

loans.name: Eulalio Antonio

texts.es:
Eulalio, vive con su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos con edades de 22, 14 y 12 años, toda su familia es dependiente; para salir adelante con su familia hace 15 años instalo una panadería en su vivienda, aprendió a elaborar y comercializar el pan cuando estaba muy joven y apoyaba a su padre en su negocio, trabaja de lunes a domingo.
Invertirá en materia prima para el pan como: levadura, harina, huevos, azúcar, manteca y otros materiales indispensables para tener mayor productividad de su negocio, tendrá disponibilidad de productos para trabajar por una larga temporada y generar los ingresos que necesita para mejorar las condiciones de vida familiar.
Los sueños del sr. Eulalio son seguir creciendo con su negocio y mantener el apoyo que le da a sus hijos para que continúen estudiando y culminen una carrera en la universitaria.
texts.en:
Eulalio lives with his life partner and their three children, ages 22, 14 and 12.  All members of the family are dependents and in order to support his family, Eulalio set up a bakery in his house 15 years ago.  He learned how to make and sell bread when he was very young by helping his father in the business.  He works Monday through Sunday.

He plans to buy ingredients such as yeast, flour, eggs, sugar, shorting and other required items to increase production.  He will have the products on hand for a longer period of time and will be able to generate the income he needs to improve his family's living conditions.

Eulalio's goal is to continue growing his business and keep supporting his children so they can finish their education and get a university degree.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as yeast, flour, eggs, sugar, shortening, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy metal sheeting, wood and nails to change the roof of his house.

loans.name: Iris Del Carmen

texts.es: Ante la necesidad de conseguir ingresos adicionales para el sustento de su familia, Iris de 23 años,  identificó una oportunidad de negocio desde la comodidad de su hogar al iniciar una miscelánea, alterno a esta actividad también ofrece productos por medio de catálogos especializados.  La principal ventaja de trabajar desde su casa ha sido el tiempo que puede dedicar a su hija de nueve años, quien necesita de mucho tiempo y cuidado, así mismo puede realizar las demás labores en el hogar sin inconvenientes. Los residentes del barrio en el que vive en el municipio de Barranquilla son sus principales clientes y pueden realizar sus compras todos los días en el horario de 8 a.m. a 7 p.m., ella les brinda facilidad de pago.  Sus compras las realiza en depósitos de la ciudad y pedidos por catálogo,  cancela de contado o a crédito.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para surtir el negocio con papelería y útiles escolares, cosméticos y demás artículos.  Iris está invirtiendo para responder a la demanda del mercado y obtener más ingresos. Sus metas a largo plazo están encaminadas a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, por ello necesita realizarle adecuaciones a su vivienda y ampliar el negocio.
texts.en:
Given the need to generate additional income to support her family, Iris, 23, saw the opportunity to open a business from the comfort of her own home. She set up a general store, in addition to a specialized catalog service.

The main advantage of working from home has been that she is able to look after her nine-year-old daughter who needs a lot of care and attention. In addition to this, she can also do the housework at her convenience.

Her main customers are the people who live in her neighborhood in the town of Barranquilla.  They can shop at her store every day between 8 am and 7 pm. Iris offers different ways for them to pay.

She buys her goods in the city or orders them by catalog, paying for them either by cash or credit.

At the moment she is applying for a loan with Kiva. This is the first loan she has asked for as part of the Mario Santo Domingo foundation. She will use the loan to stock her business with stationary and school supplies, cosmetics and other general goods.

Iris is investing in her business to satisfy the market demand and generate more income. Her long-term goals are focused on improving the quality of life for her family. In order to do this, she needs to make some improvements to her home and expand her business.

loans.use: to stock her business stationary and school supplies, cosmetics and other goods.

loans.name: Lidia Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Lidia es una mujer dedicada y muy trabajadora, se dedica al comercio y su negocio es la venta de abarrotería en general, su negocio lo realiza desde hace 7 años, su negocio se ubica en su casa y está en un punto muy bueno por estar en la zona comercial de su barrio.
Doña Lidia se levanta muy temprano a atender a sus clientes, inicio su negocio por la falta de empleo solicita el apoyo del crédito para la compra de azúcar, manteca, refrescos, arroz, pollos, embutidos, etc. Para surtir su negocio y poder satisfacer mejorar la demanda de sus clientes, espera que esta inversión le permita obtener mejores ganancias para poder salir adelante con su familia. 

Danli,  Honduras -  Abril del 2015
texts.en:
Lidia, is a dedicated and hard-working woman. She has worked in commerce for seven years running a grocery store from her home.  It is nicely located in the commercial center of her neighborhood.

She started this business because she was unemployed.  Every day, she gets up very early to serve her customers.

She is asking for a loan to buy sugar, butter, soft drinks, rice, cold meat, etc. so she can stock her business.  This will help her to satisfy the customer demand better, generating more profit so she can provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy general groceries.

loans.name: Yajaira Astrid

texts.es:
Yajaira, se dedica a vender variedad productos de catálogos, vive junto a su familia y su esposo, no tiene hijos, la casa en la que habitan es alquilada, el negocio nació con una pequeña venta de fragancias, actualmente vende de otros productos, su madre le enseño el oficio, tiene el negocio desde hace dos años, lo hace de manera ambulante en un horario de siete de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde, hasta la fecha no ha tenido dificultades en mantener su negocio y atender su hogar.
Necesita de un crédito para comprar lociones, cosméticos, productos de cocina y otro tipo de mercadería que se encarga por catálogo, su plan es tener mayores niveles de inversión, incrementar las ventas y por ende mayores ganancias, de esta manera satisfacer las necesidades sociales y de consumo.
Sus aspiraciones son tener una mejor situación económica que sea de beneficio para su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Yajaira sells products by catalog. She lives with her family and her husband. They don't have any children. The house they live in is rented.

She started her business after selling a small amount of perfumes on one occasion . Now she sells a variety of products. Her mother taught her this business and she has been running it for two years.

She sells her products on the streets from seven in the morning until four in the afternoon.

Up to now, she has had no difficulties combining running the business with looking after her home.

She needs a loan to buy creams, cosmetics, kitchen products and other general goods which she can order by catalog.

Her plan is to have a higher amount of investment in her business, increase sales and as a result, generate more income.

This will help her satisfy her needs socially and provide for the family.

She dreams of becoming more financially secure which will help her close family.

loans.use: to buy creams, cosmetics, kitchen products and other goods by catalog.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Juana se dedica al comercio su fuente principal de ingresos proviene de la venta de tortillas, esta actividad la realiza hace mas de 2 años, se levanta muy temprano atender su negocio.
Doña Juana está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de maíz, leña y cal, espera que esta inversión le permita salir adelante en su negocio y poder así seguir apoyando a su familia, está muy agradecida, ya que con el apoyo del credito anterior pudo construir la galera que tanto necesitaba.
Doña Juana sueña con tener una maquina de elaborar tortillas porque su clientela ha aumentado y necesita producir más.

Danli,  Honduras -  Abril del  2015
texts.en:
Juana earns a living selling tortillas and has been in business for over two years.  She gets up very early to attend to her business.

She is requesting a loan to buy corn, firewood and lime and hopes this investment will allow her to get ahead in her business so she can continue to support her family.  She is very grateful because with the previous loan she was able to build a porch that she badly needed.

Juana dreams of having equipment to make tortillas as her customer base has increased and she needs to produce more.


Danli, Honduras - April 2015

loans.use: To buy corn, firewood and lime for her business.

loans.name: Sadorat

texts.ru:
Садорат трудолюбивая женщина 49 лет. Она замужем и  имеет 3-их детей. Она очень хорошая женщина. Она любит свою семью и старается для семейного благополучия. Она занимается куплей продажей продовольственных товаров. 
 Садорат сотрудничает с МДО Арванд с 2013 года. Она хочет расширить свой бизнес. Но у неё не хватает собственных средств. Она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом.  Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Sadorat is a hard-working 49-year-old woman. She is married and has three children. She is a very good woman. She loves her family and strives for its well-being. She buys and sells food products.

Sadorat has been cooperating with MDO Arvand since 2013. She wants to expand her business but she does not have enough money. She has applied to Arvand for a loan. She hopes for a positive result and is grateful in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy food goods for sale.

loans.name: Pirmahmad

texts.ru:
Пирмахмад мужчина 45 лет, женат, отец пятерых детей. Он родился в сельской местности. Пирмахмад закончил 9 классов школы и начал работать, помогать родителям. У него было много братьев и сестер, он был старшим в семье.
В 18 лет Пирмахмад женился и остался жить со своими родителями. Сейчас у него большая семья: жена, пятеро детей и родители. Пирмахмад занимается земледелием. Выращивает орехи и продает их на рынке. Также он занимается животноводством. У него 4 коровы. Жена Пирмахмада доит коров и относит молоко для продажи. Пирмахмад работает в поте лица, чтобы обеспечить свою семью и чтобы его семья не голодала. Сейчас Пирмахмад хочет купить удобрения для почвы и закупить корм для коров. Но у него нет полной суммы денег. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Он надеется, что МДО Арванд откликнется на его просьбу о помощи и выделит нужную сумму. Благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Pirmahmad is a 45-year-old married man and father of five children. He was born in a rural location. Pirmahmad  completed nine years of school and began working to help his parents. He had many brothers and sisters, and he was the eldest in the family. At 18 years old Pirmahmad got married and remained living with his parents. Now he has a large family: a wife, five children, and parents. Pirmahmad is a crop farmer. He grows nuts and sells them at the market. He also rears animals. He has four cows. Pirmahmad's wife milks the cows and puts the milk up for sale. Pirmahmad works by the sweat of his brow to provide for his family and ensure they do not go hungry. Now Pirmahmad wants to buy fertilizer for his plot of land and to buy feed for his cows. But he does not have enough money. He has therefore applied to MDO Arvand for financial support. He hopes that MDO Arvand will respond to his request for help and will allocate the required amount. He is grateful for the support and trust.

loans.use: to fertilize his land and purchase livestock feed.

loans.name: Daisy Del Carmen

texts.es:
Daisy, vive en una casa familiar, comparte su vida con su compañero de vida y sus hijos, tiene como fuente de ingresos una tienda de variedad de productos para uso doméstico y venta de lácteos, el negocio lo aprendió de sus padres, de hacerlo de manera independiente tiene 2 años y lo inicio con capital propio, conforme ha pasado el tiempo ha ido mejorando el inventario.
Necesita que se le preste capital para comprar bebidas, huevos, condimentos, aceite, lácteos,  boquitas, entre otros productos que sus clientes estén necesitando, su propósito es tener un negocio más competente para atraer nuevos clientes y mejorar sus ingresos.
Daysi sueña con mantener su negocio en el mercado para  subsistir con su familia y que sus hijos puedan tener mejor calidad de educación.
texts.en:
Daisy lives in a family home. She shares her life with her life's companion and her children. Her source of income is a store that sells a variety of products for domestic use and dairy products. She learned the business from her parents. She has been doing it on her own for 2 years and she started it with her own capital. As time has gone in, she has improved her inventory. 

She needs to be lent capital to buy beverages, eggs, seasonings, dairy products, snacks, and other products that her customers are needing. Her goal is to have a more competent business to attract new customers and improve her income.

Daysi dreams of keeping her business in the market in order to survive with her family, and for her children to have a better quality education.

loans.use: to buy beverages, eggs, seasonings, oil, dairy products, snacks, and other products that her customers are needing.

loans.name: Holida

texts.ru:
Холида трудолюбивая женщина 36 лет. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Холида работает уборщицей в районной больнице. Она очень трудолюбивая и порядочная  женщина. Её мужа зовут Бахромчон. Она работает разнорабочим на стройке. Холида сотрудничает с Арванд с 2013 года. Она получала кредит на открм скота и потребительские нужды.  Холида рассказывает, что после того, как она начала сотрудничать с Арванд, качество её жизни стало постепенно улучшаться. 
В данное время Холида вместе со своим мужем хотят отремонтировать дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Холида обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Holida is a hard-working 36-year-old woman. She is married and has three children. Holida works as a cleaner in a district hospital. She is a very hard-working and decent woman. Her husband is called Bahromchon. He works as a laborer on a construction site. Holida has been collaborating with Arvand since 2013. She received a loan for animal feed and consumer goods. Holida says that after she began collaborating with Arvand the quality of her life began to improve gradually.

At this time, Holida and her husband want to renovate their house so they have good living conditions. Holida has turned to Arvand for this, and she wants to receive a loan to buy construction materials to renovate her house. She hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to renovate her home.

loans.name: Cambitas Group

texts.es:
Gladys es una mujer de 38 años de edad, vive con su pareja, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, constante, atenta, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona Sur de la ciudad, un lugar que reúne una vez al año cerca de mil artesanos en la feria de ‘la Alasita’ dónde se oferta todo tipo de bienes en miniatura con el fin de que esa miniatura se materialice y se haga realidad. De clima cálido sub tropical muy húmedo con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Gladys es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado por detrás, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el guaraní que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la realiza junto a su pareja que trabaja como plomero. Viven en un cuarto alquilado construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de cemento que cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo no cuenta con alcantarillado. La necesidad de mejorar su negocio la llevo a reunir a micro empresarios y formar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de verduras, venta de fruta, venta de desayunos, taller de cerrajería, venta de artículos de limpieza, venta de ropa de segunda mano, taller de parchado de llantas venta de lácteos, para solicitar un préstamo y generar mejores ingresos. Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional, como; Sopa de Remojado (sopa de huesos), majao encapao (charque molido, plátanos hervidos y arroz), arroz con queso (arroz, leche y queso), y otros, “aprendí a cocinar por herencia familiar, trabajé como ayudante y me independicé…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes constantes, la desventaja es que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar víveres e insumos de cocina, como; fideo, arroz, aceite, carnes, papa, etc. Su sueño es abrir un restaurante, ella desea comprar víveres e insumos de cocina por mayor para la venta de comida tradicional. Esta es la 8 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 8 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Gladys solicita un préstamo para la compra insumos de cocina por mayor para abrir un restaurante de comida tradicional.
texts.en:
Gladys is a 38 year old woman. She lives with her spouse and has no children. Her business is selling traditional food.  

She is enterprising, independent, stable, attentive, responsible and very hardworking. She runs her business in the southern part of the city. Once a year, close to a thousand artisans meet there for the ‘la Alasita’ festival, where all kinds of things are sold in miniature. The idea is that the miniature thing will materialize and become reality. It has a sub-tropical, warm and very humid climate with a temperature that varies in the day between 21-35 degrees celsius.

Gladys has dark skin, brown eyes, long black hair that she wears braided back, short stature, and a medium build. Her mother tongue is Guaraní, which she speaks at home, and she speaks Spanish in the general culture and in her business. She lives her life with her spouse, who works as a plumber. They live in a rented room built of brick and cement with a sheet metal roof and a cement floor. It has electricity and well water, but no sewage hookup. The need to improve her business led to her joining some micro-business owners and forming a bank of people with businesses such as: selling vegetables, selling fruit, selling breakfasts, a locksmith shop, selling cleaning items, selling second hand clothing, a tire repair workshop, and selling dairy products. They did this in order to ask for a loan and generate more income. Her business is selling traditional food such as: sopa de remojado (bone soup), majao encapao (ground, dried meat, boiled plantains and rice), rice and cheese (rice, milk and cheese), and more. “I learned to cook from my family heritage. I worked as an assistant and I went off on my own…” she remarks. The advantage of the business is that is has regular customers. The disadvantage is that she doesn't have enough capital to buy produce and ingredients such as pasta, rice, oil, meats, potatoes, etc. Her dream is to open a restaurant. She wants to buy produce and ingredients wholesale to sell traditional food. This is her 8th loan cycle with the institution during the 8 years that she has been doing this activity.  

These are the reasons that Gladys is asking for a loan to buy cooking ingredients wholesale in order to open a traditional food restaurant.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients wholesale in order to open a traditional food restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, beans, eggs, oil, rice, coffee, bread, flour, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Lindomar

texts.es:
Lindomar, se dedica a comercializar madera y a cultivar maíz y frijol, trabaja de manera independiente desde hace más de 15 años, inicia a trabajar a las seis de la mañana y finaliza su jornada a las cinco de la tarde; vive con su compañera de vida e hijos, don Lindomar es el proveedor de alimento, vestuario, etc., en su hogar.
Comprará árboles para mejorar la variedad de madera, así como también insumos agrícolas para sembrar granos básicos, será de utilidad para atender mejor a sus clientes y aumentar sus ventas, busca mejorar sus ingresos.
Sus sueños son ampliar su negocio, mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda y darles oportunidad de estudio a sus hijos para que puedan ser personas de bien en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Lindomar sells wood and grows corn and beans. He has worked independently for more than 15 years. He starts work at six in the morning and ends his workday at five in the afternoon. He lives with his life's companion and children. Lindomar provides food, clothing, etc. in his home. 

He will buy trees to improve the wood variety, as well as agricultural materials to grow basic grains. It will be useful to better serve his customers and increase his sales. He seeks to improve his income. 

His dream is to expand his business, improve the infrastructure of his home and give his children educational opportunities so that they can be upright members of society.

loans.use: to buy trees to improve the variety of wood, as well as agricultural materials to plant basic grains.

loans.name: Zebormo

texts.ru: Зебормо женщина 45 лет, замужем, мать семерых детей. Она родилась в сельской местности и с детства приучена к труду. Когда обычные дети играли в песочнице, Зебормо помогала матери доить коров и относила на рынок для продажи, когда другие дети ездили на море, Зебормо помогла отцу собирать урожай. Зебормо в 17 лет вышла замуж и начала взрослую семейную жизнь. Её муж не мог обеспечить большую семью, поэтому Зебормо решила начать зарабатывать. Она начала заниматься животноводством. Сейчас у нее в стаде 3 коровы. Она очень любит свое занятие и любит работать на воздухе. У Зебормо семеро детей, самому младшему 5 месяцев. Она работает день и ночь, чтобы дети её не знали тяжелой жизни. В настоящее время она хочет закупить корм для скота, но у нее нет полной суммы денег. Поэтому она обратилась в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой. Она надеется, что МДО Арванд откликнется на ее просьбу о помощи и выделит нужную ей сумму. Она благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Zebormo is a woman of the age of 45. She is married and the mother of seven children. She was born in a rural village and was accustomed to work since childhood. When the other children were playing in the sandbox, Zebormo helped her mother milk cows and take it to the market to sell. When the other children went to the seaside, Zebormo helped her father gather the harvest. 

At the age of 17, Zebormo got married and started her adult life. Her husband was not able to provide for the family alone, and therefore Zebormo decided to start earning money too. She started working with livestock breeding. Currently she has three cows in her herd. She loves her work very much, and she loves to work in the open air. 

Zebormo has seven children, and the youngest one is five months old. She works day and night in order for her children to not know any hardship. Currently she would like to purchase livestock feed, but she does not have the full amount of money needed. Therefore she turned to MDO Arvand for financial support. She hopes that MDO Arvand responds to her request for help, and provides her with the necessary amount. She thanks for the support and trust.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Angela Idalia

texts.es: Ángela de 31 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace 6 años, por lo que se siente feliz de haber logrado terminar de construir su vivienda aunque sea humildemente. Ella se dedica a prestar sus servicios domésticos desde hace 2 años de forma domiciliar. Ángela no cuenta con el servicio de agua potable en su vivienda, lo que causa por ello que decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI que le permite invertir en: tubos, codos, grifos y mano de obra para instalar agua potable en su vivienda, y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida y sanidad, ya que a causa de la falta de agua potable los miembros de su grupo familiar y ella se han visto afectados por enfermedades.
texts.en: Ángela is 31 years old. She has lived in her own home with her family group for 6 years. That is why she is happy to having finished building her home, however humble. She has worked offering domestic services for 2 years. Ángela doesn't have potable water in her house, and so she has decided to ask   FUSAI for a loan, which will allow her to invest in pipes, ell joints, spigots and labor to install potable water in her home. This way, she can improve her quality of life and health, because due to a lack of potable water, the members of her family and she herself have been affected by illnesses.

loans.use: to invest in tubes, ell joints, spigots and labor in order to install potable water in her home

loans.name: Cecilia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Cecilia, vive con su esposo y tres hijos con edades de 14, 12 y 2 años, no tiene parientes en el extranjero; hace tres años compro un puesto de venta en el mercado, ofrece ropa sandalias, artesanías y artículos varios, lo atiende sola, eventualmente le apoya su esposo, por su parte él se dedica atender un molino nixtamal, ella trabaja con un horario de siete de La mañana a cinco de la tarde o según sea la demanda de la temporada.
Comprará ropa, calzado y otros productos para tener nuevas ofertas en su negocio, el resto será de utilidad para reparar el techo del local debido a que se aproxima el invierno, se decidió a trabajar con créditos por ser una herramienta para surtir su negocio de manera inmediata para mejorar las ganancias y disminuir las deudas.
Su sueño es tener un negocio más surtido, para lograr trabajar con capital propio y darles a sus hijos el apoyo para que se superen académicamente.
texts.en:
Cecilia lives with her husband and three children who are 14, 12 and 2 years old. She does not have relatives abroad. Three years ago she bought a market stall where she sells sandals and various artisanal items. She runs the stall on her own and helps her husband who works at a corn mill. She works from seven in the morning to five in the evening, although this changes depending on demand and the season.

With the loan she will buy clothing, shoes and other products in order to have new stock for her business. The rest will be used to repair the roof of her stall before winter. She decided to ask for a loan to be able to immediately stock her business in order to increase her income and reduce her debts.  

Her dream is to have a more stocked business so that she can then run her own business with her own money and support her children so that they can progress in education.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes and other products in order to have new stock for her business. The rest will be used to repair the roof of her stall before winter.

loans.name: Noel Fernando

texts.es:
El Señor Noel es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto a su familia. Su negocio es una Pulpería, desde hace 10 años, la cual funciona en su casa de habitación en el municipio donde vive. 
Don Noel necesita el préstamo para la compra de más productos como azúcar, frijoles, agua, arroz, harina, etc. para seguir realizando su trabajo el cual le brinda una gran parte de sus ingresos. Con el préstamo espera que sus ventas aumenten y que este le sirva de mucho ya que no cuenta con los productos necesarios para cubrir los pedidos solicitados por sus clientes.
Don Noel espera poder mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia con el aumento de los ingresos en el hogar y que sus hijos tengan los estudios necesarios, para que puedan tener mayores oportunidades en la vida.


Choluteca, Honduras – Abril  del  2015
texts.en:
Noel is a very hardworking and responsible man who lives with his family in a town south of Honduras. He has been running a local convenience store from his home for ten years.

Noel needs the loan to buy sugar, beans, water, rice, flour, etc. in order to carry on running his business which provides him with the majority of his income. He hopes that the loan will help him increase his sales as at the moment he does not have the necessary products to cover the demands of his customers.  

Noel hopes that the increase in income will allow him to improve the quality of life of his family and allow him to provide his children with the necessary education so that they have better opportunities to become successful in their lives.

Choluteca, Honduras – April 2015

loans.use: to buy sugar, beans, water, rice, flour, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies that help in the planting of corn and sorghum

loans.name: Epiphanie

texts.en: Epiphanie is 31 years old. She is married with 4 children aged between 2 and 11 years. She owns a shop and she has been in a business for the past 7 years, while her husband is a farmer. With the loan, she would like to buy more biscuits and Colgate to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house. In the future, she aims to earn at least 500,000 Rwandan francs (RWF) per month.

loans.use: to buy more biscuits and Colgate to sell.

loans.name: Elsy Yessenia

texts.es:
Elsy, está acompañada, vive con su hermana y una hija de 11 años de edad; ella desde hace 10 años elabora venta de panes con pollo, hot dog, bebidas, etc., aprendió a desarrollar está actividad con el apoyo de familiares y por el momento no presenta dificultades en su negocio.
Ha tomado a bien solicitar un crédito para comprar embutidos, pan, aderezos, bebidas, lechugas, tomates y otros ingredientes que son parte de la materia prima para elaborar la venta, fortalecer su negocio y atenderá mejor a sus clientes.
Elsy desea convertir su negocio en una fuente de ingresos más rentable para apoyar a su hija en los estudios.
texts.en:
Elsy lives with her life partner, sister and 11 year-old daughter. She has been making and selling chicken, hot dogs, drinks etc. for 10 years. She learnt how to do this from her relatives and at the moment she is not having any problems with the business. 

She is asking for a loan to buy cold meats, bread, seasoning, drinks, lettuce, tomatoes and other ingredients that are used in the making of the products she sells. This will enable her to strengthen her business and better attend to her customers.   

Elsy wants to make her business a more profitable source of income in order to financially support her daughter's education.

loans.use: to buy cold meats, bread, seasoning, drinks, lettuce, tomatoes and other ingredients that are used in the making of the products she sells.

loans.name: Santos Reyes

texts.es:
Santos, comparte su vivienda con su esposa y sus tres hijos, todos son dependientes de don Santos; se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado desde hace más de 21 años, el negocio lo aprendió de sus padre, también ofrece el servicio de albañilería como un medio para tener ingresos extras.
Invertirá en ganado, para mejorar el negocio, espera tener nuevos clientes así como también mejores ventas e ingresos, las ganancias las utilizara para cancelar la deuda y mejorar el estilo de vida que lleva con su familia.
Su objetivo es hacer buen uso del crédito y cancelarlo sin dificultades.
texts.en: Santos lives with his wife and three children, all of whom are dependent on him. He has been making a living through buying and selling livestock for over 21 years. He learnt how to do this through his father. He also works part-time as a bricklayer in order to earn extra income. He will invest the loan in livestock in order to improve his business. He hopes that it will provide him with new clients as well as more sales and income. He will use the money he earns to pay off debts and improve his family's quality of life. His aim is to make good use of the loan and to pay it off without any problems.

loans.use: to invest in livestock in order to improve his business.

loans.name: Sylvie

texts.en: Sylvie, 45, is married with 1 child who is 14 years old. She owns a shop and she has been in business for the past 3 years. Her husband is a businessman. With this loan, she would like to buy more soap, salt and biscuits to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy a piece of land. In future, she aims to earn at least 200,000 RWF per month

loans.use: to buy more soap, salt and biscuits to sell.

loans.name: Jose Rigoberto

texts.es:
José, dice que con el préstamo anterior ha mantenido surtido su negocio y cuanta con sus clientes satisfechos, los ingresos son de ayuda para ir cubriendo las necesidades familiares y pagar los costos de estudio de sus hijos.
Necesita reactivar el inventario de su negocio, por lo que está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar ropa, calzado, artesanías de barro y de madera, le ayudara a seguir teniendo su fuente de ingresos para salir adelante junto a su familia.
texts.en:
José says that with his last loan he stocked his store and he has satisfied customers. The income is of help when covering the household necessities and to pay the cost of school fees for his children.

He needs to restock the inventory of his business so he is asking for a new loan to buy clothing, footwear, and handicrafts made of clay and from wood. This will help him continue to have his source of income in order to support his family.

loans.use: to buy clothing, footwear, and handicrafts made of clay and from wood. This will help him continue to have his source of income.

loans.name: Sofia Esperanza

texts.es:
Sofía Esperanza tiene 56 años de edad vive junto a su esposo e hija en el distrito de Cayaltí, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz, comercio y ganadería, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como pavos, patos, cuyes y gallinas, Sofía nos explica que se dedica a esta actividad para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos familiares, son una familia unida que se esfuerza en su labor, El se dedica al cultivo de yucas, maíz, frejol y los ofrece en el mercado de la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales y así tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes lo que le generará ingresos mayores que van a mejor su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Sofía Esperanza is 56 years old and lives with her husband and daughter in Cayaltí district, where the population works raising sugar cane, rice, and in trade and animal husbandry, 2 hours from the city of Chiclayo on the northern coast of Peru. 

She works raising and selling small animals such as turkeys, ducks, guinea pigs, and hens. Sofía tells us that she does this work to support her husband with the family expenses. They are a close-knit family that puts a lot of effort into their work. He works growing yucca, corn, beans and sells them in the market in the area. She asks for a loan to purchase balanced feed to fatten her animals and, in this way, have a better production to offer to her customers, which will generate more income which will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed to fatten her animals.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive en casa propia con su menor hijo en una comunidad tranquila, donde la gente se dedica al comercio, ganadería y agricultura, se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Lagunas, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace más de 5 años aproximadamente por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio asi como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, esto le permitirá mejorar su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lidia is 43 years old, a single mother, and lives in a house she owns, with her younger son, in a peaceful community where the people work in trade, animal husbandry and agriculture, which is located in Lagunas district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. 

She works raising and selling small animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, and more. Her business is located at her home. She has done this work for more than approximately 5 years, so she has experience in this business and has good personal and work references in her district. The loan will be used to purchase a greater quantity of animals for her business and also balanced feed to fatten them. This will permit her to improve her level of income and, in the end, her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of animals for her business and also balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Esperanza

texts.es:
Esperanza tiene 61 años de edad, vive en casa propia en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la preparación y venta de alimentos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, realiza esta actividad desde hace 15 años y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales como pollos, gallinas, patos, pavos, entre otros. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de una mayor cantidad de insumos para la elaboración de sus alimentos, con esto ella espera mejorar la calidad del servicio que brinda a sus clientes lo que le va a generar ingresos mayores que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Esperanza is 61 years old and lives in a house she owns in a community which works in trade, agriculture and animal husbandry, which is located in Cayaltí district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. 

She works preparing and selling food. Her business is located in her own home, she has done this work for 15 years and has good personal and work references in her district. In addition, she works raising and selling animals such as chickens, hens, ducks, turkeys and more. The loan will be used to purchase a greater quantity of supplies to make her food, with this she hopes to improve the quality of the service she offers her customers, which will generate more income which will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of supplies to make her foods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, galvanized metal sheeting, and beams to finish building her house and offer her daughter better living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics, imitation leather, adhesives and threads.

loans.name: Jose Omero

texts.es:
Jose tiene 34 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en el distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad pequeña donde la vida es tranquila y los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, se encuentra ubicada en la región de Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica al cultivo de café, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 10 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en el mismo y con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para su cultivo de café, esto le permitirá obtener un mejor producto y aumentar su nivel de ventas lo que va a incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 34 years old, lives with his spouse and their three children in the district of Callayuc, in a small community where life is peaceful and the population works in agriculture and animal husbandry, located in Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. 

He works growing coffee, he has worked in this business for 10 years, so he has experience in it and has good personal and work references in his district. The loan will be used to purchase manure and fertilizer for his coffee crop, this will allow him to get a better product and increase his level of sales, which will increase his level of income, with the end of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizer for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Rosa Haydee

texts.es:
Rosa, tiene una venta pupusas y panes con pollo, desde hace más de 2 años, el negocio lo fundo por necesidad de salir adelante y tomo clases de cocina para desempeñarlo mejor; tiene una familia formada por su esposo de 47 años de edad, solo una persona depende económicamente de ella, no cuenta con ayuda del extranjero y atiende el negocio sola.
Como sus demandas poco a poca aumentan, requiere de un préstamo para comprar una plancha con la que podrá aumentar su producción de pupusas y atender mejor a sus clientes, con la inversión busca aumentar la rentabilidad de su negocio y tener mejor calidad de vida junto a su familia.
Rosa planea administrar de la mejor manera el crédito para tener una situación financiera más estable y resarcir su deuda lo más pronto posible.
texts.en:
Rosa has sold pupusas and bread with chicken for more than 2 years. She began the business by necessity to get ahead and took cooking classes to carry out the business better. She has a family made up of her husband, 47 years old; only one person depends economically on her, she doesn't have any help from abroad, and she runs the business alone. 

Since her orders have increased bit by bit, she needs a loan to purchase a griddle with which she can increase her pupusa production and serve her customers better. With the investment, she looks to increase the profitability of her business and have a better quality of life with her family.

Rosa plans to manage the loan in the best way to have a more stable financial situation and pay off her debt as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a griddle with which she will be able to increase her pupusa production and serve her customers better.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es: Roberto de 29 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 5 años de edad al que apoya y trata de brindar lo mejor. La carpintería con la que se gana la vida Roberto tiene un gran prestigio por la excelente calidad de sus productos y la experiencia de 16 años con la que cuenta, por lo que cada día son más las personas que solicitan sus servicios. La vivienda de Roberto es muy humilde, ya que la ha lograd construir de bajareque, pero actualmente lo que le preocupa es el techo el cual se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que él ha decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Roberto is a 29 year old working man who lives with his partner and five year old son, whom he helps and tries to provide for as best he can.  Roberto's carpentry, from which he makes a living, is very well regarded due to the excellent quality of his products.  With his 16 years of experience, every day more people are seeking his services.

Roberto's home is very humble; he has built it with bamboo and mud but he is worried that the roof is deteriorated.  For this reason he has decided to request a loan from FUSAI to invest in galvanised metal sheeting, wood and nails to change the roof of his home to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to invest in galvanised metal sheeting, wood and nails to change the roof of his home

loans.name: Wayna Taucaray Iiigroup

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “WAYNA TAUCARAY III”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. 

La socia es la Sra. Esmeralda ella es soltera y tiene 33 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz. 

Los socios que estan pegadas a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo ya que los socios viene de diferentes lugares porque sus trabajos quedan lejos y llegaron tarde a la reunion. 

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de tejidos, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the Wayna Taucaray III communal bank group. This bank is located in Cusco district, part of Cusco province and Cusco department.

The member Esmeralda is single and is 33 years old. She works in her grocery store business. She sells basic products such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil. The member works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. The member has had this business for 5 years and it is going very well for her. The member's dream is to expand her grocery store business. The member asks for the loan to purchase milk, sugar, oil, and rice. 

The members that are in the photos attached to the group photo took their pictures after the meeting because they asked permission due to work reasons, since the members come from different places because their work is far away and they arrived late to the meeting. 

The other members work in a business selling knitted products, a business selling clothing, a grocery store business, and a business selling food.

The member is grateful to those who are part of this dream through this platform and promises to make the payments on the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase milk, sugar, oil and rice.

loans.name: Norida

texts.en:
Norida is married and works hard to support her family. She operates a direct selling business, selling Avon products in the Philippines, which she has been doing for seven years.

Norida requested a loan from NWTF for 12,000 PHP, which she will use to buy items to sell such as beauty products, personal care products, etc. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase beauty and personal care products

loans.name: Jesus Salvador

texts.es:
Jesús, se le presenta la necesidad de invertir en el negocio y no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios, por tal razón se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo crédito con el que podrá comprar paletas y cajas de sorbetes de sabores, en cantidades mayores ya que le ofrecen el producto a un mejor precio, espera que las ventas se mantengan y pueda tener mejores ganancias.
Con el financiamiento anterior su negocio ha mejorado mucho y está generando los ingresos que tanto necesita para que su familia tenga una vida más digna.
texts.en:
Jesús has the need to invest in his business and doesn't have the necessary economic resources. For this reason, he has decided to ask for another loan with which he will be able to purchase popsicles and boxes of flavored sorbets, in bulk quantities since they offer him the product at a better price. He hopes that the sales will continue and he can have better earnings. 

With the previous loan, his business has improved a lot and is generating the income that he needs so much so that his family has a more dignified life.

loans.use: to purchase popsicles and boxes of flavored sorbets in bulk quantities since they offer him the product at a better price.

loans.name: Elda

texts.en:
Elda is 45 years old, married, and has five children, three of whom attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Elda operates a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 13 years. 

Elda requested a loan from NWTF for 20,000 PHP, which she will use to buy wheels and other spare parts for her tricycle. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase wheels and other spare parts for her tricycle

loans.name: Maria Ninfa

texts.es:
La señora María es una persona muy trabajadora, humilde  y responsable vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto a su familia. Se dedica a la venta de gallinas y cerdos, desde hace ya 10 años.
Doña María su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación y lugares aledaños  en el municipio donde vive. Necesita el préstamo para la compra de gallinas y cerdos para su negocio y así seguir realizando su negocio, el cual le brinda una gran parte de sus ingresos.
Doña María con el préstamo espera que sus ventas aumenten y que este le sirva de mucho ya que no cuenta con los productos que ahora le exigen sus clientes para cubrir los pedidos solicitados y gracias a esto poder mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia con el aumento de los ingresos en el hogar. 
Doña María espera en un corto plazo hacer crecer su negocio y  con esto poder seguir apoyando a su familia y que sus hijos tengan los estudios necesarios, para  tener mayores oportunidades en la vida.


Choluteca, Honduras – Abril del  2015
texts.en:
María is a very hard-working, humble, and responsible person. She lives in a community in the south of Honduras with her family. She has worked selling chickens and pigs for the past 10 years. 

María's business is located in her house and in nearby areas in the municipality where she lives. She needs the loan to purchase chickens and pigs for her business and in this way continue with her business, which brings her a large part of her income.

With the loan, María hopes that her sales will increase and this will help her a lot because she doesn't have the products that her customers demand now to cover the requested orders and, thanks to this, to be able to improve her family's quality of life with the increase of income in the household.

María hopes, in the short term, to make her business grow, and with this, be able to continue supporting her family and that her children have the education they need to have better opportunities in life. 

Choluteca, Honduras – April 2015

loans.use: to purchase chickens and pigs for her business.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is a 61-year-old woman. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Lilia has a mat-weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials needed like nipa leaves, etc.

Lilia has been in this business for 46 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for weaving mats like nipa leaves, etc

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 50 years old and married with four children, one of whom is in school, Rosita works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy-and-sell firewood business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional firewood to sell.

Rosita has been in this business for five years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional firewood to sell
